ListContent1:
"
  • As a Design Lead, inspire and collaborate with other designers to make their work better.
  • Own the design process end-to-end – translating research into actionable insights, then designing workflows and design to build product features.
  • Deliver excellent experiences to our customers through both your own craft of design, strategy and execution, as well as by fostering a team of top-notch designers.
  • Direct and deliver design strategies, frameworks and deliverables on a broad range of projects, near-term and future.
  • Work closely with engineers as they build the design
  • Contribute to and participate in a collaborative, knowledge-sharing design community.
  • Oversee the evolution and implementation of our brand design guidelines for all marketing and communication channels
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 5+ years of experience in design positions in successful high-growth ecommerce/internet, online media or software product companies.
  • 3+ years leading and managing teams.
  • Demonstrated leader with ability to attract outstanding talent, create and sustain a culture of high performance.
  • Strong technical ability; capable of conducting mission-critical design discussions with Product Managers and business leads.
  • Skilled at implementing and optimizing organizational structure and creative development processes that allow the design team to scale with the company.
  • Product-minded design leader with the confidence and ability to be a thought-partner to business leads and CEO.
  • Track record of translating product vision into actionable plans that lead to the creation of high-quality user experience and engagement.
"

Description:
"Flock is the #1 Team Messenger, with an aim to increase communication and collaboration for teams of all shapes and sizes. At Flock, we believe that enterprise communication should be richer and efficient. With that goal, we have developed and deployed an outstanding suite of apps that enhance workplace communication and productivity.
With teams at companies like Avendus, Gini and Jony, Endurance International Group, Yepme and Healthkart improving their workplace collaboration using Flock, we are already helping teams have richer and more efficient communication around the globe.
We are looking for engineers who are passionate about solving complex problems and building platforms at scale.
"
Additional:
"Flockers love their jobs, and not just because we offer the most competitive salaries in the industry. Our excellent benefits include everything from great medical and life insurance to catered meals. Our workspaces are comfortable and fun, complete with bean bag chairs, ping pong tables, and all the snacks you can eat. We have no dress code (tee-shirts are a-ok!). We have flexible work hours and flexible holidays, which means that teams pick their own work hours.Flock has its own concierge desk that doubles up as a travel agency.
We are passionate about building the next generation of web products, and we believe that happy Flockers are the key to achieving this goal. If you like the idea of working in an exciting workspace on cutting-edge internet products that make a truly global impact (and wearing flip-flops to work), then we want to get to know you!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Design and develop large scale distributed services
  • Design and implement new user-facing features
  • Take ownership of one or more components of the platform and drive innovation in your area of ownership
  • Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, stability, and security of the platform as a whole
  • Work closely with product management and UX design teams to define and refine feature specifications
  • Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables
  • Participate actively in recruitment and nurturing of engineers as awesome as you
"
ListTitle2: Who Should Apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Solid foundation in computer science with strong competency in data structures, algorithms and software design
  • Java expert. Experience with golang, python or other languages is a plus
  • Good understanding of nuances of distributed systems, scalability and availability
  • Good knowledge of one or more relational and NoSQL databases and transactions
  • In-depth understanding of concurrency, synchronization, NIO, memory allocation and GC
  • Experience with IaaS clouds like AWS/Google Cloud, Azure, OpenStack etc
  • Experience in a startup environment is a plus
  • Good communication skills. Putting your thoughts through to other stakeholders in a cohesive manner is not a problem for you.
"

Followers: "Devashish Sharma, Nishant Das, Shwetha Quinita Dsouza, Bhavik Maganlal Kaklotar"
Description:
"About Flock
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.
 
With 30,000 businesses already using the platform we know that we are onto something big, and are now gearing up for a period of rapid growth.

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Resellerclub, Logicboxes and BigRock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.

Role Overview
Flock is seeking an experienced Software Engineer to join the Platform Team. The Platform team is responsible for building and managing large distributed components that run Flock. We handle everything from Core Messaging Infrastructure, Messaging Storage, Flock platform to Analytics. We are looking for engineers who are passionate about solving complex problems and building platforms at scale.
"
Additional:
"Additional Resources
Recommended - Detailed Intro to Flock
Flock Intro videoFlock vs Slack video
About Flock’s Platform
Our Youtube Channel

Client Case Studies
How Ituran improved communication with Flock
How Dietitians on demand increased efficiency with Flock
How Hiyo created a virtual office for remote teams with Flock

Benefits and Perks
We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth.

And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our workspaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!

We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal. If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"

"

  • Design and implement new user-facing features

  • Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, stability, and security of the platform as a whole

  • Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables

Followers: "Manika Dhamija, Devashish Sharma, Shwetha Quinita Dsouza, Amit Dhaka, Taher Ghadiali, Bhavik Maganlal Kaklotar"
Description:
"About Flock
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.
 
With 30,000 businesses already using the platform we know that we are onto something big, and are now gearing up for a period of rapid growth.

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.

Role Overview
As a front end engineer at Flock, you will create products that use leading-edge web technologies within a passionate team of world-class engineers. You will contribute to the technical strategy and tactics for the Flock web platform while implementing the client side code across Flock web properties. The ideal candidate is energized by making a business impact, is an expert in web front end development with strengths in HTML5 and single-page apps, and enjoys working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment alongside other exceptional people.
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Design and build a web ecosystem that drives the business and meets the functional needs of our customers and partners.
  • Optimize web applications to maximize speed and scale. Support diverse clients from high powered desktop computers to small footprint mobile devices.
  • Write client-side/backend code for web-based applications, create fast, easy-to-use, high volume production applications, and develop prototypes quickly.
  • Maintain high coding standards and cross-functional interaction with other Flock teams.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 2+ years of experience in building Single page applications using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
  • Experience in working with any server side technologies.
  • Good knowledge of one or more of client side MV* frameworks (such as React, Angular, Backbone + Marionette)
  • Knowledge of Design Patterns is a must.
  • Good knowledge of using SVGs to build complex graphs.
  • Experience with unit tests, integration tests, continuous integration systems (such as Jekins/Travis), deployment and operations automation.
"
ListContent3:
"
  • You have built progressive web apps
  • You have run Node.js cluster for a web application serving millions of users.
  • You know how to reduce loading time under 1 second and render content at 60fps jank free
  • You keep little photographs of Doug Crockford and Brendan Eich in your wallet.
  • You think closures and anonymous self-executing inner-functions can solve most of the world’s problems.
  • You truly understand what “this” is, and you have an opinion about whether it’s a good thing or a bad thing.
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Understand the behavior of complex web-based applications and apply that knowledge towards testing.
  • Contribute towards the overall test strategy and test plan of the product.
  • Create and execute test scenarios; select the best methods, techniques and evaluation criteria for testing.
  • Identify test data requirements and generate required data to support testing.
  • Evaluate and analyze application behavior and data for potential software issues.
  • Clearly report issues found during testing.
  • Create test deliverables required by company and project testing standards.
  • Work collaboratively with other testers, developers, and stakeholders.
  • Participate in, and occasionally lead, process improvement efforts.
  • Contribute during design reviews and recommend product improvements.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • B.E./B.Tech/B.Sc.IT/BCA degree in computer sciences or equivalent field.
  • 2 to 4 years of experience in manual testing, design and execution.
  • Hands on testing experience of large scale web-based applications.
  • Good Knowledge of Functional Testing, System Testing & Regression Testing.
  • Experience in designing and executing manual test plans and test scripts for complex systems.
  • Understanding of Software Development Lifecycle and hands on experience with quality. assurance processes and methodologies.
  • Experience with at least one testing tool for test case management and defect management.
"

ListContent1:
"
  • To identify potential global business and marketing partners, build proposals, lead negotiations and get these partnerships activated
  • To brainstorm and ideate on creative marketing activities.
  • To plan and roll out marketing campaigns to effectively reach target audiences.
  • To manage Email Marketing Campaigns and Social Media Marketing.
  • Work with management to ensure deadlines and meeting budgets every single time.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this?
ListContent2:
"
  • You should have 2-4 years of Strategic Alliances, Partnerships and Bizdev & Marketing experience.
  • You should be a BMM / BMS Graduate.
  • You should possess strong marketing and business acumen.
  • You should have strong written and communication skills.
  • You should be good at managing multiple activities & projects across teams.
  • You should have an appetite to take risks and work under stringent deadlines & constraints.
  • You should be a go-getter and always have a can-do attitude.
  • You should be a people's person and with a gift of the gab
"

ListContent1:
"
  • This role will require you to own and lead marketing and customer acquisition for Flock.
  • Team Management- You will lead a team of 15+ reportees. These will comprise content writers, event managers, marketing associates, designers and videographers / animators
  • Marketing Strategy- Define the overall marketing strategy to get maximum brand awareness and recall within CXOs in mid to large enterprises
  • Content Marketing- Lead our content marketing initiatives. Manage a team of content writers who are responsible for online content, blog, website. Draft and coordinate the design of whitepapers, pitch decks, video scripts and more. Create brochures, collateral, booth designs and other content relevant for events. Produce creative video content ongoingly (dozens of videos each quarter)
  • PR- Strategizing and executing PR strategies, creating content and coordinating with the press and with our PR agencies. Strategizing and implementing event participation at relevant conferences and events. Identifying awards that we should apply for and managing our awards calendar. Managing our influencer outreach programs
  • Digital Marketing- Strategize and execute targeted digital Marketing campaigns – SEM, Social etc. Manage and Optimize digital marketing budgets to deliver positive ROI
  • Branding- Defining the brand strategy, brand guidelines and positioning for specific markets / countries. Implementing brand guidelines and decisions across all communication
  • Event participation- Identify comprehensive list of relevant conferences worldwide. Strategy and execution for our participation and sponsorships. Design of booth, brochures, content and other assets
  • Event Series- Strategy and execution of our own event series
  • Strategic Marketing initiatives- Implementing other partnerships and Strategic Marketing initiatives globally as relevant
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • You have several years of experience in Heading the marketing function for tech company (preferably in the B2B SaaS space)
  • You have strategized and delivered on creative marketing and branding campaigns within the Enterprise space
  • You have led PR, Events, Branding and Content Marketing activities
  • You have conceptualized, managed, analyzed and optimized extensive digital marketing campaigns to deliver leads / signups with a positive ROI
  • You have led participation in multiple conferences and events
  • You have a flair for ideating and building creative content
  • You are very creative wrt Product Marketing strategy
  • You have immaculate written and oral communication skills, excellent business acumen, and a penchant for marketing internet products
  • You have the gift of the gab and can deliver effective sales pitches
  • You are highly numerate and believe in measuring and analyzing everything you possibly can
  • You are very hands on
  • You are passionate about building a brand in the Tech space
  • You are a go-getter and can deliver effective pitches to potential distribution partners
"

Followers: "Upali Sarkar, Nishant Das, Steffi Dsouza, Benjamin David Pointing"
ListContent1:
"
  • Own, manage, and drive the full sales cycle from first contact through closure. This will involve creative email communication for follow-ups, active face-to-face meetings, webexes and conference calls with the senior leadership in each organization.
  • Participate in events led by Flock’s marketing team.
  • Prepare targeted sales pitches and relevant collaterals.
  • Manage and deliver on aggressive revenue and customer acquisition targets and stretch goals
  • Ensure meticulous usage of our CRM.
  • Obsessively monitor key success metrics such as acquisition rates and deal sizes. As well as proactively suggest and implement improvement strategies wherever necessary.
  • Participate in Daily / Weekly / Monthly meetings and report relevant metrics to the Management.
  • Provide instant feedback on a daily basis from the field to the Product team and coordinate delivery of product features / changes required to close accounts.
  • Build excellent relationships with other BD Managers within your assigned City in order to share and implement best practices.
  • Work closely with the account management to drive post sales success and engagement.
  • Establish and maintain relationships with industry influencers and key strategic partners.
  • Stay abreast about the latest developments in the enterprise messaging and collaboration space, and implement strategic / tactical plans if need arises.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for the Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • You have 3 to 7 years of experience in Business development, Sales, Customer Acquisition, or Account Management in the Tech industry, preferably in the B2B SaaS space.
  • You possess excellent analytical capabilities – you love your CRM tools and the insights it can provide to you and your team. You work daily to improve your sales effectiveness through data driven decisions.
  • You have immaculate selling skills and can deliver the most effectively targeted pitches.
  • You are meticulous in your follow-ups, very well organized. Nothing ever slips through the cracks and you communicate with every lead regularly without fail.
  • You possess the ability to work with aggressive targets, and think of out-of-the-box solutions when in a deadlock.
  • You are very hands on and believe in getting things done effectively.
  • You have the ability to assess market trends, shape sales strategies and generate ideas for product development.
  • You possess excellent communication skills, can elucidate goals and reach agreements maintaining the interests of all departments.
  • You take great pride in being an excellent networker; and have the capability to build and maintain strong and lasting business relationships with colleagues and clients alike.
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Implement and develop automated test practices for both, native android app and its web interfaces primarily using Android’s UiAutomator, Espresso testing APIs .
  • Design and create test scripts using Java to address areas such as performance impacts, app scenarios, regression testing, error or bug retests. Bash, Python scripts to setup test environment, run scheduled tests, send test reports.
  • Work with the Test Manager and colleagues to define process and strategy associated with automation.
  • Plan test schedules or strategies in accordance with project scope/feature delivery dates.
  • Strive to increase test coverage with urgency.
  • Participate in product design reviews to provide input on functional requirements, product designs, or potential problems.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • You love programming and writing elegant, clean code, and have been doing so for 2+ years
  • You enjoy solving problems (and are good at it!)
  • You are pro-active and get stuff done
  • You enjoy working with smart, fun people in a friendly, collaborative environment
  • A solid grasp on programming fundamentals OO principles.
  • Taking ownership to plan and build new tests for the rapidly expanding feature set.
  • Experience with Git.
"
ListContent3:
"
  • Experience with UiAutomator, Espresso.
  • Experience with CI tools and frameworks.
  • A real passion for Android as an OS and mobile tech landscape in general.
  • You root, flash experimental ROMs on your phone at whim.
"

ListContent1:
"
  • As a Sales & BD Specialist, you will get an opportunity to work on an independent project from scratch. The project will have a direct impact on the growth and revenue of the business. Open only for highly enthusiastic individuals who are up for big challenges.
  • Identifying potential leads, developing and executing strategic alliances to generate revenue.
  • Develop and execute a comprehensive account plan, evaluate benefits of association with prospects
  • Manage end to end partner relations including pitching and negotiation.
  • Brainstorm and ideate creative marketing ideas to increase product adoption & awareness
  • Planning and rolling out marketing campaigns to effectively reach target audiences.
  • Establish best practices in digital marketing and stay up-to-date with digital technologies and developments.
  • Generate and analyze campaign reports, followed by suggesting solutions to boost sales and partners.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for the role?
ListContent2:
"
  • You have an engineering graduate degree.
  • You have 1-3 years experience in technology related sales or business development.
  • You have immaculate communication skills and can deliver the most effective targeted pitches.
  • You have sharp business acumen, and a penchant for marketing internet products.
  • You are highly numerate and believe in measuring and analyzing everything you possibly can.
  • You have an ability to complete large volumes of work quickly and independently with a high level of drive, initiative and self-motivation.
  • Should be dynamic with strategy formulation and acceptance of idea with logical reasoning.
  • Have an ability to complete large volumes of work quickly and independently with a high level of drive, initiative and self-motivation.
"

Followers: "Poppin Mathias, Ninad Raval, Richa Tripathi, Sanya Malik"
ListContent1:
"
  • Participate in all the phases of the product, from discovery to delivery to iteration. You’ll work closely with Product Managers, Interaction Designers, Visual Designers and Front-end Engineers to build a robust design system and a world-class product.
  • You will be responsible for designing a holistic experience taking into consideration various user touchpoints, and understanding the user’s journey over time as they interact with the product.
  • Rapidly iterate and prototype new features. You should know how to use prototypes as a primary canvas for communicating ideas both internally and externally.
  • You will be involved in user testing to be able to constantly validate and refine ideas as well as collect new insights. You should be able to discard ideas, no matter how good they are, if they fail to drive value to our end users.
  • You should exhibit fluency in both Interaction and Visual Design, knowing when to dive into wireframes and when to plunge into pixel-perfection.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 3-5 years of demonstrated product design experience.
  • A very strong understanding of interaction and visual design concepts.
  • The ability to clearly communicate and document your design decisions.
  • Excellent communication skills.
  • Understanding of the nuances of each platform, be it Desktop, Android or iOS.
  • Mastery of design tools including Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, Principle etc
"

ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:

  • You have a flair for ideating and building creative content
  • You have the gift of the gab
  • You are very hands on

Followers: "Shwetha Quinita Dsouza, Devashish Sharma, Janushi Saumil Shah, Nishant Das, Sampath Mallikarjunan"
Description:
"About Flock

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Bhavin has also been the Founder / Co-Founder of Media.net, Directi, Radix,Ringo, Codechef and Zeta. These businesses comprise of 1500+ people, 8+ offices, 10+ million customers, revenues over $250+ million and a group enterprise value of over $1.4 billion.

Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app that aims at increasing productivity and improving team-communication in organizations of all shapes and sizes. At Flock, we believe that enterprise communication should be richer and efficient. With that goal, we have developed and deployed an outstanding suite of products that enhances workplace communication and productivity.

Flock’s feature set includes :
- Secure one on one chat/ Group chat
- Video conferencing
- Audio Conferencing
- Process Automation
- Real time business process and workflow automation
- Mailing lists… and much more

With teams at companies like Tim Hortons, Victorinox, Aranca, Mothercare, Ricoh and Ituran improving their workplace collaboration using Flock, we are already helping teams have richer and more efficient communication around the globe.

Additional Resources
Recommended - Detailed Intro to Flock
Flock Intro video
Flock vs Slack video
About Flock’s Platform
Our Youtube Channel

Client Case Studies
How Ituran improved communication with Flock
How Dietitians on demand increased efficiency with Flock
How Hiyo created a virtual office for remote teams with Flock
"
Additional:
"Benefits and Perks

We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth. 

And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our workspaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!

We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal.

If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"

Followers: "Devashish Sharma, Nishant Das, Bhavik Maganlal Kaklotar"
Description:
"About Flock
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.
 
With 30,000 businesses already using the platform we know that we are onto something big, and are now gearing up for a period of rapid growth.

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Resellerclub, Logicboxes and BigRock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.

Role Overview
Rated as a cool vendor in Unified Communications & Collaboration by Gartner, Flock is on a mission to increase productivity for teams and has been ranked as the #1 alternative to Slack by PCMag. As a Lead of front-end engineering you'll be uniquely positioned to drive growth for Flock to the next set of million users while building a truly global performant SaaS product. You will play a pivotal role in conceptualizing, designing and developing various front-end engineering projects across web, mobile and desktop platforms. You will be involved in the entire life cycle of these projects, including strategy, vision, design, UX, coding, architecture, deployment etc, and will be chiefly expected to deliver clean, well-designed, stable and highly available systems.
"

Followers: "Richa Pancholy, Seena E, Shwetha Quinita Dsouza, Nishant Das, Dushyanth Harinath"
Description:
"About Flock
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.
 
With 30,000 businesses already using the platform we know that we are onto something big, and are now gearing up for a period of rapid growth.

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Resellerclub, Logicboxes and BigRock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.

Role Overview
We are looking for a talented individual to join our DevOps and Platforms Engineering team. You will play an important role in helping build and run our globally distributed infrastructure stack and platforms. Technologies you can expect to work on every day include Linux, AWS, MySQL/PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Hadoop/HBase, OpenTSDB, ElasticSearch, Jenkins, Docker and Ansible amongst others.
"
Additional:
"Additional Resources
Recommended - Detailed Intro to Flock
Flock Intro videoFlock vs Slack video
About Flock’s Platform
Our Youtube Channel

Client Case Studies
How Ituran improved communication with Flock
How Dietitians on demand increased efficiency with Flock
How Hiyo created a virtual office for remote teams with Flock

Benefits and Perks
We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth.

And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our workspaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!

We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal. If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Build automation tools for provisioning and managing our cloud infrastructure by leveraging the AWS API for EC2, S3, CloudFront, RDS and Route53 amongst others
  • Proactively seek out opportunities and contribute to enhancing and managing various infrastructure services such as monitoring , orchestration and continuous delivery pipelines.
  • Work closely with software development teams to build reliable and scalable services that power our products.
  • Enhance and maintain our metrics and logs collection, processing and visualization infrastructure
  • Automate systems configuration by writing policies and modules for configuration management tools
  • Write both frontend (html/css/js) and backend code (Python, Ruby, Perl)
  • Participate in Production Operations, Oncalls etc and troubleshoot and fix production outages , performance issues etc in our AWS/Linux infrastructure stack
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 1 to 4 yrs of DevOps and Operations Engineering experience
  • In depth Linux/Unix knowledge, good understanding of the various kernel subsystems (cpu, memory, storage, network etc)
  • DNS, TCP/IP, Routing, HA & Load Balancing
  • Configuration management using tools like Ansible, Puppet or Chef
  • SQL and NoSQL databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB and HBase
  • Build and packaging tools like Jenkins and RPM/Yum
  • HA and Load balancing using tools like the Elastic Load Balancer and HAProxy
  • Monitoring tools like Icinga, Sensu, Pingdom or similar
  • Log management tools like logstash, fluentd, syslog, elasticsearch or similar
  • Metrics collection tools like Ganglia, Graphite, Influx, Prometheus, Elastic stack, OpenTSDB etc
  • Programming in a high level language like Python or Ruby
"

ListTitle1: What is the Business Unit like?
ListContent1:
"
  • CodeChef is a non-profit educational initiative of Directi. It is a global competitive programming platform which supports over 50 programming languages and has a large community of programmers that helps students and professionals test and improve their coding skills. Its objective is to provide a platform for practice, competition and improvement for both students and professional software developers. Apart from this, it aims to reach out to students while they are young and inculcate a culture of programming in India.
"
ListTitle2: What is the Job like?
ListContent2:
"
  • As an Operations Assistant, you will be responsible to streamline operational processes at CodeChef. You would also be expected to :
  • Ideate, procure and manage goodies.
  • Take care of various procurement needs such as marketing collaterals, t-shirts, goodies etc.
  • Get competitive vendors onboard and interact with them for procurement needs.
  • Provide logistics support.
  • Onboard Problem Setters for CodeChef’s contests and interact with them regularly.
  • Maintain MIS of finances and expenses.
  • Prepare monthly business report.
"
ListTitle3: Who Should apply for this role ?
ListContent3:
"
  • In order to be an ideal fit to this position, you should:

  • Be meticulous, methodical & extremely well organized.
  • Be a proactive team player with positive attitude.
  • Must have a sense of urgency and flexibility.
  • Must have high level of sincerity, responsibility and self-motivation.
  • Must have willingness to work over weekends (if needed).
  • Must have basic computer skills, good knowledge of MS Office applications such as Excel and Word.
  • Have good persuasive skills.Have good verbal and communication skills.
  • Be a graduate from any stream (Fresher’s can also apply).
  • Must have an ability to complete large volumes of work quickly and independently.
  • Should be based out of Mumbai.
"

Description:
"As a front end engineer at Flock, you will create products that use leading-edge web technologies within a passionate team of world-class engineers. You will contribute to the technical strategy and tactics for the Flock web platform while implementing the client side code across Flock web properties. The ideal candidate is energized by making a business impact, is an expert in web front end development with strengths in HTML5 and single-page apps, and enjoys working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment alongside other exceptional people.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Design and build a web ecosystem that drives the business and meets the functional needs of our customers and partners.
  • Optimize web applications to maximize speed and scale. Support diverse clients from high powered desktop computers to small footprint mobile devices.
  • Write client-side/backend code for web-based applications, create fast, easy-to-use, high volume production applications, and develop prototypes quickly.
  • Maintain high coding standards and cross-functional interaction with other Flock teams.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 2+ years of experience in building Single page applications using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
  • Experience in working with any server side technologies.
  • Good knowledge of one or more of client side MV* frameworks (such as React, Angular, Backbone + Marionette)
  • Knowledge of Design Patterns is a must.
  • Good knowledge of using SVGs to build complex graphs.
  • Experience with unit tests, integration tests, continuous integration systems (such as Jekins/Travis), deployment and operations automation.
"
ListContent3:
"
  • You have built progressive web apps
  • You have run Node.js cluster for a web application serving millions of users.
  • You know how to reduce loading time under 1 second and render content at 60fps jank free
  • You keep little photographs of Doug Crockford and Brendan Eich in your wallet.
  • You think closures and anonymous self-executing inner-functions can solve most of the world’s problems.
  • You truly understand what “this” is, and you have an opinion about whether it’s a good thing or a bad thing.
"

ListContent1:

  • The chef must be willing to follow recipes and execute daily menus provided by the employer, as well as generate suggested menus based on the employer preferences.
  • Paying attention to employer’s and his guest’s intolerance for specific ingredients and other special dietary requirements.
  • The Chef must coordinate with Dietician to follow the diet chart.
  • The chef will be responsible for refrigerator/storage/kitchen organization.
  • Monitoring food budget and making sure that all supplies are bought  within the set budget.
  • Serving is not expected of the chef, but tight coordination and expediting of meal service with butler/ staff servers is required.
  • During holidays or large group visits, the chef will work with team of household staffs to deliver the expected services.
  • Flexibility for travel to employers other residences is required, with the understanding that these trips will include weekends and breakfasts as well as lunches and dinners. International travel possible for 1-2 weeks at a time, approximately 6-8 times per year.
  • Strong organizational skills, and dedication to maintaining a clean kitchen.
  • Making sure the kitchen meets all regulations, including sanitary and safety guidelines. HACCP knowledge is required.
  • Basic computer skills (MS Office) required for entry of weekly menus and new recipes into system.
  • The chef may be given additional and/or alternative duties from time to time at employer’s discretion.

Description:
"The Sales Development Representative (SDR) is responsible for identifying and qualifying sales opportunities for Flock. This position lays the foundation for a highly rewarding future in tech. sales. 
To be clear this is not cold calling. You will be expected to conduct research on all prospects and only reach out to those where there is a possible fit. The purpose of the role is not to directly sell the product but instead learn a little bit about the prospects business, educate the prospect on the enterprise messaging space and if there is a potential fit for their business and ours, generate enough curiosity to secure a meeting with the appropriate stakeholders.
For the first year you will help cultivate leads for Account Executives (members of the team who are responsible for closing the final deal). After about a  year, depending on performance, you will start to be assigned leads of your own, putting you on the pathway to becoming a Account Executive, a role which carries great earning potential.

"
ListContent1:
"
  • To support the growth of Flock user base through Inside Sales techniques (phone  conversations, voicemail, email and social media) for english speaking foreign markets.
  • Quickly and effectively research all assigned leads, providing a clear understanding of the prospect & company.
  • Educate prospects on the enterprise messaging space.
  • Furthermore, being willing and able to share relevant information about trends developing in the prospects industry.
  • Be utterly committed to following established processes and meeting SLA’s in a high quality fashion.
  • Work with existing lead sources and generate own leads through research.
  • Not be afraid to respectfully challenge customers and push for a ‘close’(meeting/demo) where it makes sense for the customer and for us.
  • Gain a fundamental understanding of the Flock product such that you can convincingly and concisely convey the benefits too prospects
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 1- 4 years of experience into inside sales, lead generation or business development..
  • Should be willing to work in US Shift (7 pm- 4 am).
  • Successful track record in a consultative/solution sales environment.
  • Candidate should have extensive inside sales experience selling to foreign countries.
  • You should be target driven - there are targets for everything in this role - you should love working in this sort of environment.
  • You should be curious - you want to understand how prospect’s businesses work and it is no effort for you to keep on top of trends in the tech. space.
  • You are a self starter - if you can’t reach a particular prospect through one channel/contact - you won’t wait for instruction - you will automatically looks for alternative routes etc.
  • Strong presentation skills and the ability to articulate product concept over the phone to prospects.A knack to simplify and explain technology to prospects.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
"

Followers: "Deepika Joshi, Suman Prakash Das, Poppin Mathias"
ListContent1:
"
  • As a Strategic Partnerships & Alliances Specialist, you will be part of a newly formed Business Development Team for .STORE domains , that will work on critical and interesting strategic partnerships with global entities from the eCommerce and Retail ecosystem.
  • Categories of potential strategic partners would comprise:
  • Retail Associations such as emota.eu
  • eComm Builders such as BigCommerce, Shopify
  • Agencies associated with eCom platforms such as Shopify
  • Affiliate Platforms such as Conversion Junction and others!

As part of your KRAs you will be expected:

  • To identify potential strategic partners for .STORE in the eCommerce and Retail vertical and work with the .STORE team to design proposals and marketing programs to onboard them
  • To work through with diligent focus and patience to acquire and onboard these partners to offer .STORE domains to their network through interesting programs
  • To manage each of the on-boarded partners and initiate periodic marketing programs with each of them ensuring ""warm-leads"" remain ""warm"" throughout the period of engagement, and also regularly measuring and evaluating the success of the marketing programs through various performance metrics
  • To have a focused mindset to look for opportunities to grow value from on-boarded partners, collaborating with the brand team, through various initiatives
  • To ensure pipeline management and development through platforms and tools such as Salesforce ensuring periodic and timely reporting and tracking of all leads and opportunities
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • You have 1-4 years of experience in Strategic Partnerships and Product Marketing
  • You are a BMM/ BMS Graduate
  • You are driven, ambitious, yet assiduous, and thrive in a fast-paced environment
  • You are a stellar individual contributor, well aligned towards over-arching organizational goals and focuses more on the long-term successes as opposed to short-term wins
  • You are a sales shark with top-notch passion and focus in terms of identifying opportunities and closing them
  • You should possess strong marketing acumen and are inventive with a penchant to experiment and try new things
  • You have strong written and communication skills
  • You are good at managing multiple responsibilities -  a focused multi-tasker!
  • You have an appetite to take risks and work under stringent deadlines & constraints
  • You are a go-getter and have a can-do attitude

"The Sales Development Representative (SDR) is responsible for identifying and qualifying sales opportunities for Flock. This position lays the foundation for a highly rewarding future in tech. sales. 
To be clear this is not cold calling. You will be expected to conduct research on all prospects and only reach out to those where there is a possible fit. The purpose of the role is not to directly sell the product but instead learn a little bit about the prospects business, educate the prospect on the enterprise messaging space and if there is a potential fit for their business and ours, generate enough curiosity to secure a meeting with the appropriate stakeholders.
For the first year you will help cultivate leads for Account Executives (members of the team who are responsible for closing the final deal). After about a  year, depending on performance, you will start to be assigned leads of your own, putting you on the pathway to becoming a Account Executive, a role which carries great earning potential.

"
ListContent1:
"
  • To support the growth of Flock user base through Inside Sales techniques (phone  conversations, voicemail, email and social media)
  • Quickly and effectively research all assigned leads, providing a clear understanding of the prospect & company.
  • Educate prospects on the enterprise messaging space.
  • Furthermore, being willing and able to share relevant information about trends developing in the prospects industry.
  • Be utterly committed to following established processes and meeting SLA’s in a high quality fashion.
  • Work with existing lead sources and generate own leads through research.
  • Not be afraid to respectfully challenge customers and push for a ‘close’(meeting/demo) where it makes sense for the customer and for us.
  • Gain a fundamental understanding of the Flock product such that you can convincingly and concisely convey the benefits too prospects
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 0- 1 years of experience into Inside Sales, Sales Support or Lead generation.
  • Successful track record in a consultative/solution sales environment.
  • Candidate should have extensive inside sales experience selling to foreign countries.
  • You should be target driven - there are targets for everything in this role - you should love working in this sort of environment.
  • You should be curious - you want to understand how prospect’s businesses work and it is no effort for you to keep on top of trends in the tech. space.
  • You are a self starter - if you can’t reach a particular prospect through one channel/contact - you won’t wait for instruction - you will automatically looks for alternative routes etc.
  • Strong presentation skills and the ability to articulate product concept over the phone to prospects.A knack to simplify and explain technology to prospects.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

"

ListContent1:
"
  • Maintaining 100% uptime for all critical equipment, preventive maintenance of all assets and infrastructure.
  • Engagement with Procurement to manage day today requirements.
  • Vendor management SLAs and contract management, vendor rate and contract negotiation
  • To manage employees food, tea coffee, snacks, drinking water adherence to company’s policy/process.
  • To take care of the Building and electrical compliances,
  • Monitoring and execution of Annual Maintenance Contracts for various equipment, assets & facilities.
  • To Develop and drive the services strategy for the company and implement solutions for achieving cost efficiency.
  • Understand the business requirements and post agreement from stakeholders program manage to deliver the facilities on time and within budget.
  • Ensure Hygiene, Safety and Security of all employees at all facilities.
  • Ensure best services to company using appropriate SLA and KPI performance.
  • Maintain efficient relationships with statutory, administrative, government and law enforcement agencies, across locations where company operates.
  • Undertake contract negotiations and vendor finalization, finalize rate contracts with outside vendors during festive occasions and also during renewals
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:

  • A natural problem solver, with boundless enthusiasm for getting things done
  • Ability to handle details of a highly confidential and critical nature
  • Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks
"

Description:
"As a Marketing Intern for Startup League, you will work on business development activities and also marketing campaigns for a new strategic project called the Startup League ( www.startupleague.online ) that is designed to support and onboard startups using Radix
domains from across the globe.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Work with the marketing lead to onboard startups for various global events like The Next Web, Tech In Asia, Rise Conf, Web Summit, etc.
  • Identify opportunities to target new potential sign ups, and on board them through business development activities.
  • Independently handle the first interaction and lead potential startups through the sales funnel.
  • Identify partnership opportunities for the Startup League with global startup events and meetups.
  • Work with the team on creating marketing collateral for web and print to help onboard startups. These will include online ads, landing pages, webinars, flyers, presentations, etc.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
• You should have exceptional written and communication skills.
  • You should be good at managing multiple activities & projects.
  • You should have an appetite to take risks and work under stringent deadlines & constraints.
  • You should be go-getter and have a can-do attitude.
  • You should be a people's person and use the gift of gab to get out of tricky situations.
  • You should have a passion for the startup space and be eager to learn more about it.
ListTitle3: How will this internship help you?
ListContent3:
"
  • Global exposure - As a part of this project, you will be interacting with startups and other entities from across the world. Our primary target geographies being Europe and Southeast Asia.
  • Project Management - You will learn to manage multiple tasks at the same time which is essential for the successful completion of this project.
  • Business Development - You will learn how to craft communication effectively to grow and expand the reach of this program by bringing on board new partners.
  • Consumer Behavior - In integral part of your work would consist of navigating a potential startup through the sales funnel, understanding their needs, anticipating their concerns and creating solutions for them on the fly.
  • Marketing Acumen - You will be work closely with the marketing leads to create messaging and collateral that will increase the perceived value of our offering with the target audience.
"

Description:
"About Flock
Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Bhavin has also been the Founder / Co-Founder of Media.net, Directi, Radix, Ringo, Codechef and Zeta. These businesses comprise of 1500+ people, 8+ offices, 10+ million customers, revenues over $250+ million and a group enterprise value of over $1.4 billion.

Flock’s GTM advisory board comprises of industry veterans in inbound marketing and sales - Kipp Bodnar and Mark Roberge.
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app that aims at increasing productivity and improving team-communication in organizations of all shapes and sizes. At Flock, we believe that enterprise communication should be richer and efficient. With that goal, we have developed and deployed an outstanding suite of products that enhances workplace communication and productivity.
Flock’s feature set includes:- Secure one on one chat/ Group chat- Video conferencing- Audio Conferencing- Process Automation - Real time business process and workflow automation- Mailing lists… and much more

With teams at companies like Tim Hortons, Victorinox, Aranca, Mothercare, Ricoh and Ituran improving their workplace collaboration using Flock, we are already helping teams have richer and more efficient communication around the globe.

Additional Resources

About Flock’s Platform
Our Youtube Channel

Client Case Studies
How Ituran improved communication with Flock
How Dietitians on demand increased efficiency with Flock
How Hiyo created a virtual office for remote teams with Flock

Flock is looking for a SEO specialist who will play an important role in defining it's traffic & user acquisition strategy. We believe organic search & SEO will be critical to the long-term growth of Flock, and this person will be the owner to drive that growth. This person should not only have a view of the high-level SEO strategy for Flock but should also be an expert on & understand the nuances of SEO execution (esp. technical SEO), working closely with a cross-functional team of marketers, developers & designers.  

You will work closely with the Marketing Director, CEO, and our advisors Kipp and Mark to plan and execute on our SEO strategy.
"
Additional:
"Benefits and Perks
We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth. 
And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our workspaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!
We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal.
If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Create and execute a robust search engine optimization strategy, including a roadmap of initiatives to drive growth.
  • Leverage the best in breed SEO tools to identify SEO opportunities to invest behind including content gaps, keyword opportunities, vertical search opportunities and more.
  • Leverage automation tools to ensure all online content is optimized for our SEO goals.
  • Work closely with the content and product team to drive the content strategy for blog, website, video, social and other content forms with the goal of improving ranking & growing relevant traffic.
  • Drive analytics initiatives to create a culture where everything is measured in realtime and every content decision is monitored from an SEO standpoint.
  • Benchmark and monitor competitor performance and activities.
  • Learn and and stay on top of key trends and best practices in search engine algorithms, competitive landscape, and the industry to develop winning strategies.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 4+ years of experience in managing SEO at high growth organizations (preferably in the B2B SaaS space)
  • A technical degree (preferably comp science)
  • Extensive knowledge of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms and ranking strategies.
  • Deep experience and expertise with a wide array of SEO Analysis tools such as SEMRush, Ahrefs, Moz, and Google Analytics.
  • Deep expertise in Search Engine Optimization (SEO) strategies, with past experience in website architecture, SEO audits, and keyword analysis
  • Previous experience with technical SEO & strong knowledge of all possible onsite and off-site optimizations.
  • Strong data analytics skills
  • Intimate Understanding of web development technologies such as HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
  • Demonstrates an understanding of the principles of optimization for organic search.
  • Avid reader of books, blogs and relevant SEO resources.
"

Role
Rated as a cool vendor in Unified Communications & Collaboration by Gartner, Flock is on a mission to increase productivity for teams and has been ranked as the #1 alternative to Slack by PCMag. As Director of Marketing you'll be uniquely positioned to drive growth for Flock to the next set of million users while building a truly global SaaS brand. You will play a pivotal role in defining Flock's brand voice, positioning & differentiation strategy. You’re a seasoned marketing leader, passionate about building a game changing brand, who will lead strategy and execution for all top of the funnel demand generation channels, including but not limited to SEO, content marketing, PR, performance marketing, referrals and affiliate marketing. 
You will work closely with the CEO - Bhavin Turakhia and our advisors Kipp and Mark to plan and execute on our TOFU and MOFU strategy.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Define and drive our TOFU demand generation strategy to exponentially scale relevant traffic and signups for Flock.
  • Define the brand strategy, brand guidelines, messaging and positioning for specific markets / countries
  • Drive Flock's content strategy at the top of funnel leading to creation of a comprehensive range of content types, including blog posts, downloadable guides, differentiated use cases, videos, case studies, white papers, content for email campaigns, product launch content, customer stories, webinars and more.
  • Drive and scale our SEO, SMM and SEM strategy and execution
  • Oversee PR strategy
  • Drive marketing automation and analytics initiatives to create a culture where everything is measured in realtime and every decision is monitored
  • Lead the team in annual and quarterly planning, keeping track of budget, and reporting on marketing initiatives’ performance, with a focus on ROI & user growth.
  • Work closely with multifunctional teams such as sales, product, engineering and operations teams to drive the overall product growth vision.
  • Lead the performance marketing strategy for Flock with goal to drive ROI positive user acquisition at scale.
"
ListTitle2: Characteristics
ListContent2:
• Empathetic marketing thinker who understands what the customer needs and why.
  • Flair for ideating and building creative content
  • Natural collaborator and cross-functional executive.
  • Dynamic people leader who values transparency and accountability.
  • Highly numerate and believes in measuring and analyzing everything s/he possibly can.
  • Very hands on
ListContent3:
"
  • 7+ years of experience in leading & managing marketing teams at high growth organizations (preferably in the B2B SaaS space).
  • A technical degree (preferably comp science) from a prestigious college and/or MBA from a prestigious B-school in US would be preferred
  • Strategized and delivered on demand generation and content marketing within the Enterprise space at scale.
  • Expertise in defining and optimizing SEO, SMM, SEM, PR and content marketing related campaigns
  • Track record of user growth through organic and paid acquisition channels including, SEO, email marketing, social media, SEM, Social ads, affiliate marketing and more.
  • Deep expertise, knowledge and hands on experience in setting up, managing and optimizing Marketing Automation and CRM tools.
  • Experience in defining and optimizing drip campaigns and customer touch points.
  • Demonstrated ability to have recruited, mentored and grown a world-class marketing team.
  • Experience in marketing beyond North America will be an added bonus.
  • Immaculate written and verbal communication skills, excellent business acumen, and a penchant for marketing internet products.
"

Description:
"About Flock
Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Bhavin has also been the Founder / Co-Founder of Media.net, Directi, Radix, Ringo, Codechef and Zeta. These businesses comprise of 1500+ people, 8+ offices, 10+ million customers, revenues over $250+ million and a group enterprise value of over $1.4 billion.

Flock’s GTM advisory board comprises of industry veterans in inbound marketing and sales - Kipp Bodnar and Mark Roberge.

Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app that aims at increasing productivity and improving team-communication in organizations of all shapes and sizes. At Flock, we believe that enterprise communication should be richer and efficient. With that goal, we have developed and deployed an outstanding suite of products that enhances workplace communication and productivity.
Flock’s feature set includes:- Secure one on one chat/ Group chat- Video conferencing- Audio Conferencing- Process Automation - Real time business process and workflow automation- Mailing lists… and much more

With teams at companies like Tim Hortons, Victorinox, Aranca, Mothercare, Ricoh and Ituran improving their workplace collaboration using Flock, we are already helping teams have richer and more efficient communication around the globe.

Flock is looking for a SEO specialist who will play an important role in defining it's traffic & user acquisition strategy. We believe organic search & SEO will be critical to the long-term growth of Flock, and this person will be the owner to drive that growth. This person should not only have a view of the high-level SEO strategy for Flock but should also be an expert on & understand the nuances of SEO execution (esp. technical SEO), working closely with a cross-functional team of marketers, developers & designers.  

You will work closely with the Marketing Director, CEO, and our advisors Kipp and Mark to plan and execute on our SEO strategy.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Create and execute a robust search engine optimization strategy, including a roadmap of initiatives to drive growth.
  • Leverage the best in breed SEO tools to identify SEO opportunities to invest behind including content gaps, keyword opportunities, vertical search opportunities and more.
  • Leverage automation tools to ensure all online content is optimized for our SEO goals.
  • Work closely with the content and product team to drive the content strategy for blog, website, video, social and other content forms with the goal of improving ranking & growing relevant traffic.
  • Drive analytics initiatives to create a culture where everything is measured in realtime and every content decision is monitored from an SEO standpoint.
  • Benchmark and monitor competitor performance and activities.
  • Learn and stay on top of key trends and best practices in search engine algorithms, competitive landscape, and the industry to develop winning strategies.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 4+ years of experience in managing SEO at high growth organizations (preferably in the B2B SaaS space)
  • A technical degree (preferably comp science)
  • Extensive knowledge of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms and ranking strategies.
  • Deep experience and expertise with a wide array of SEO Analysis tools such as SEMRush, Ahrefs, Moz, and Google Analytics.
  • Deep expertise in Search Engine Optimization (SEO) strategies, with past experience in website architecture, SEO audits, and keyword analysis
  • Previous experience with technical SEO & strong knowledge of all possible onsite and off-site optimizations.
  • Strong data analytics skills
  • Intimate understanding of web development technologies such as HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
  • Demonstrates an understanding of the principles of optimization for organic search.
  • Avid reader of books, blogs and relevant SEO resources.
"

Role
Rated as a cool vendor in Unified Communications & Collaboration by Gartner, Flock is on a mission to increase productivity for teams and has been ranked as the #1 alternative to Slack by PCMag. As Director of front-end engineering you'll be uniquely positioned to drive growth for Flock to the next set of million users while building a truly global performant SaaS product. You will play a pivotal role in conceptualizing, designing and developing various front-end engineering projects across web, mobile and desktop platforms. You will be involved in the entire life cycle of these projects, including strategy, vision, design, UX, coding, architecture, deployment etc, and will be chiefly expected to deliver clean, well-designed, stable and highly available systems.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Lead and own the entire life-cycle of the product – design, architecture, documentation, coding, testing and deployment.
  • Contribute hands-on, own, collaborate and deliver new features and services at a fast pace.
  • Build platforms, frameworks, APIs, libraries & automated tools to facilitate rapid issue resolution and development & deployment of new features and changes.
  • Own the prioritization, scoping and scheduling processes for new products and features.
  • Work with and advice management on technical aspects, make well-informed decisions.
  • Improve processes, technology & the applications you own continuously by showing the team better ways of doing things and help improve skills in the team.
  • Prioritize tech-debt and ensure the platforms and applications meet the latest industry standards.
  • Learn new technology & practices, coach the team and conduct training sessions – devote time for learning and continuous improvement of self and team.
  • Imbibe and maintain a strong customer service oriented attitude while designing and building products.
  • Recruit the best by owning the recruitment processes for your teams.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this post?
ListContent2:
"
  • Solid foundation in computer science with strong competency in data structures, algorithms and software design.
  • JavaScript expert. 8+ years of JavaScript experience, including concepts like asynchronous programming, closures, types, and ES6.
  • Extensive experience in HTML/CSS, including concepts like layout, specificity, cross browser compatibility, and accessibility.
  • Significant experience developing user-facing software.
  • Experience with Java, golang, python or other languages is a plus.
  • Strong interpersonal communication skills (including listening, speaking, and writing) and ability to work well in a diverse, team-focused environment with other Engineers, Product Managers, etc.
  • Sound understanding of user experience and design principles.
  • Effective problem solving skills, sharp reasoning and a logical bent of mind.
  • College or university degree in the field of computer science, information systems, or computer engineering.
"

Role
As a front end engineer at Flock, you will create products that use leading-edge web technologies within a passionate team of world-class engineers. You will contribute to the technical strategy and tactics for the Flock web platform while implementing the client side code across Flock web properties. The ideal candidate is energized by making a business impact, is an expert in web front end development with strengths in HTML5 and single-page apps, and enjoys working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment alongside other exceptional people.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Design and build a web ecosystem that drives the business and meets the functional needs of our customers and partners.
  • Optimize web applications to maximize speed and scale. Support diverse clients from high powered desktop computers to small footprint mobile devices.
  • Write client-side/backend code for web-based applications, create fast, easy-to-use, high volume production applications, and develop prototypes quickly.
  • Maintain high coding standards and cross-functional interaction with other Flock teams.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this post?
ListContent2:
"
  • 2+ years of experience in building Single page applications using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
  • Experience in working with any server side technologies.
  • Good knowledge of one or more of client side MV* frameworks (such as React, Angular, Backbone + Marionette)
  • Knowledge of Design Patterns is a must.
  • Good knowledge of using SVGs to build complex graphs.
  • Experience with unit tests, integration tests, continuous integration systems (such as Jekins/Travis), deployment and operations automation.
"
ListContent3:
"
  • You have built progressive web apps
  • You have run Node.js cluster for a web application serving millions of users.
  • You know how to reduce loading time under 1 second and render content at 60fps jank free
  • You keep little photographs of Doug Crockford and Brendan Eich in your wallet.
  • You think closures and anonymous self-executing inner-functions can solve most of the world’s problems.
  • You truly understand what “this” is, and you have an opinion about whether it’s a good thing or a bad thing.
"

ListContent1:
• To identify potential partners for our brands and work with the management to design proposals for onboarding them through strategic partnerships
  • To brainstorm and ideate on creative marketing activities
  • To plan and roll out marketing campaigns to effectively reach target audiences
  • To manage Email Marketing Campaigns and Social Media Marketing
  • Work with management to ensure deadlines and meeting budgets
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
• You should have 0-2 years of experience into Marketing.
  • You should be a BMM/ BMS GraduateYou should possess strong marketing acumen
  • You should have strong written and communication skills
  • You should be good at managing multiple activities & projects
  • You should have an appetite to take risks and work under stringent deadlines & constraints
  • You should be go-getter and have a can-do attitude
  • You should be a people's person and use the gift of gab to get out of tricky situations

ListContent1:
"
  • Support Training team in preparing training delivery plan
  • Work with various stakeholder groups to plan training logistics, schedule participants, and coordinate facilitators
  • Coordinate scheduling/logistics for multiple classes simultaneously send program invites, track responses, send calendar holds, reminders and facilitate pre-work to participants/facilitators
  • Manage and maintain participant rosters
  • Manage and maintain master coach/facilitator tracker
  • Maintain curriculum upload file and manage upcoming course discontinuations
  • Provide all logistics for regional/local office deliveries for all learning programs (Space sourcing, catering, etc.)
  • Coordinate preparation of materials needed for instructor led training
  • Track missing documentation/list of participants for offerings and submit to the LMS team
  • Create tracking spreadsheet including all course and offering information 
  • Manage and maintain in-house training facilities and equipment
  • Research and recommend new training methods, like Gamification etc
  • Generate routine and ad-hoc reports and analyze 
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Bachelor’s degree in any field
  • Relevant experience of 1-3 years
  • Experience supporting various types of training - classroom, virtual, multi-media, and online learning
  • Strong communication skills. Including oral and written communication skills; ability to convey messages in a concise manner
  • Ability to simultaneously manage training logistics for multiple deliveries and work as an individual contributor and/or within a team to achieve goal
  • Advanced organizational skills with the ability to handle multiple assignments
  • Strong project and time management skills
  • MS Office proficiency, including strong PowerPoint, Word, Outlook, and Excel skills
  • Familiarity with traditional and modern training methods and techniques 
"

  • You have run Node.js cluster for a web application serving millions of users.
  • You know how to reduce loading time under 1 second and render content at 60fps jank free
  • You keep little photographs of Doug Crockford and Brendan Eich in your wallet.
  • You think closures and anonymous self-executing inner-functions can solve most of the world’s problems.
  • You truly understand what “this” is, and you have an opinion about whether it’s a good thing or a bad thing.

Description: House Manager is a single point of contact and would be responsible for all 5 houses (Local and Global)
ListContent1:
"
  • Accountable for looking after the residence its assets, handling household bills / renewals and executive duties.
  • Schedules for the entire department and prepares daily work assignments, cleaning schedules, checklists & follows up on all outstanding issues.
  • Ensure employees are properly groomed & ensure strict adherence to hygiene standards.
  • Administering all third party vendors’ activities & their work done in the house & maintain records.
  • Maintain monthly requisition of cleaning/disposable materials, stationery & groceries.
  • Proactively maintain – Schedule all PPM activities (Preventive Plan Maintenance) such as ACs, Kitchen equipment's etc.
  • Ensures that all employees are familiar with the departmental policies and procedures and other relating to fire emergencies, evacuation, safety and first aid.
  • Co-ordinates Pest control, Cleaning, Waste Management operation for all 5 houses (globally)
  • Ensures all policies are administered fairly and consistently, disciplinary procedures and documentation are completed according to Standard and Local Operating Procedures (SOPs and LSOPs) and support the Peer Review Process.
  • Conduct a review meeting withthe owners to discuss the issues & challenges to overcome shortfalls.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Should be a graduate. Preferably post graduate in Hospitality.
  • Good experience in managing Facilities/Housekeeping.
  • Should demonstrate an ability to acquire the following attributes: leadership, initiative, problem solving, prioritizing, delegation, training and developing subordinates.
  • Should be open to travel abroad.
  • Should possess conceptual knowledge of Soft Services, Housekeeping and Hospitality services.
  • Should possess excellent verbal and written communication.
  • Should be smart, driven and energetic.
"

Posting Title: Senior Associate Corporate IT - IJP  - (From IT Helpdesk Team to Sr. SysEng Team)
ListContent1:
"
  • Experience in Windows and Linux operating system.
  • Working knowledge and previous experience supporting the following:
  • G-Suite / Google Apps for business
  • DHCP / DNS
  • Antivirus
  • WSUS
  • Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT Servers)
  • Inventory Software (OCS Inventory)
  • Citrix Xenserver Management (Any other commercial virtualization technology)
  • Backup (Bacula or any other backup software)  
  • Monitoring (Nagios or any other monitoring software)
  • Shell (Powershell / bash)

  • Skills:
  • Understanding of some of the below tools / skills:Windows
  • Reasonable understanding of Windows Systems,Understanding of netstat,Tracert,NTFS,Sharing, user access rights and groups

  • Linux:
  • Reasonable understanding of Linux Systems,Understanding of Shell/Bash, sed/awk/grep/egrep, VIM, netstat, lsof, strace, ps/top/atop, grub boot config & systems rescue, fstab/disk labels, ext3/ext4/xfs, tcpdump, IPtables, sysstat (sar/vmstat/iostat etc), init/systemd, runlevels & startup scripts, sudo/chroot/chkrootkit/rkhunter.Fundamentals:
  • Understanding of basic Networking conceptsDHCP / DNS, TCP / UDPStorage fundamentals: RAID, SAN, NAS,NFS

  • Responsibilities:
  • Windows / Linux Environment
  • Setting up windows servers with patches and server hardening procedures
  • Analyze logs, carry out RCA and fix issues
  • Liaison with internal teams and resolve issues.
  • Monitor & Manage enterprise services like
  • Antivirus Services
  • Client managementServer Side setup & Management
  • Ensuring anti-virus compliance for license and updates
  • WSUS - Update management, Troubleshooting  OCS - Maintain client / server inventory
  • AD - Computer group management, Group Policy, Give rights
  • DHCP - Scope management
  • DNS - DNS management
  • Virtualization management for production environment
  • Backups - Check daily backups and carry out sample restorations
  • Server monitoring.
  • EPABX - Extension creation,Setup hardphone
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Should have spent at least 4 years in the IT Helpdesk team.
  • Must have moved up the career path.
  • The cumulative scores of the floop feedback must be above 80% of the top scoring team member, consistently for 2 years.
  • Having moved to the Sr SysEng team, the candidate will have to work as per the schedules of Sr SysEng team
  • The score of the technical test conducted by the Sr SysEng team must be more than 85%
  • In an event of the Sr SysEng team not clearing the candidate in the first attempt, subsequent attempts can be made only after 6 months. A minimum gap of 6 months must be maintained between two attempts
  • Linux Certification - RHCSA / RHCSE - mandatory
  • Windows Server Certification - MCSA: Windows Server 2016 (Exam 70-743)
  • Windows Client Certification - MCSA: Windows 10 (Exam 70-697 and 70-698)
  • Training - https://mva.microsoft.com/
  • A minimum of science graduate
"
