Followers: "Shwetha Quinita Dsouza, Devashish Sharma, Nishant Das"
Description:
"About Flock
Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Bhavin has also been the Founder / Co-Founder of Directi( Linkedin's top companies, 2018), Radix, Ringo, Codechef and Zeta.  These businesses comprise of 1500+ people, 8+ offices, 10+ million  customers, revenues over $250+ million and a group enterprise value of  over $1.4 billion.

Flock is an enterprise  messaging and collaboration app that aims at increasing productivity and  improving team-communication in organizations of all shapes and sizes.  At Flock, we believe that enterprise communication should be richer and  efficient. With that goal, we have developed and deployed an outstanding  suite of products that enhances workplace communication and  productivity.

Flock’s feature set includes:
- Secure one on one chat/ Group chat
- Video conferencing
- Audio Conferencing
- Process Automation - Real time business process and workflow automation
- Mailing lists… and much more

With  teams at companies like Avendus, Gini and Jony, 1mg, Voonik, Yepme and  Healthkart improving their workplace collaboration using Flock, we are  already helping teams have richer and more efficient communication  around the globe.

About the Role

We are looking for a Manager to own and head systems infrastructure and platform engineering at Flock and review and influence new evolving design, architecture, standards and methods with operability in mind. S/He understands operational principles, such as capacity planning, monitoring and incident handling

In this role you will lead a team of smart DevOps engineers and System Administrators/Developers and manage our globally distributed infrastructure stack and platforms.
"
Additional:
"Additional Resources

Flock Intro video
Flock vs Slack video
About Flock’s Platform
Our Youtube Channel

Client Case Studies
How Ituran improved communication with Flock
How Dietitians on demand increased efficiency with Flock
How Hiyo created a virtual office for remote teams with Flock

Benefits and Perks
We  at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on  exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and  that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and  conducive for our personal and professional growth. 
And  Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits  ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our  workspaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping  pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose  the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered  too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short,  everything you need to be your best self at work!
We are  passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication  and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving  this goal.
If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:

  • Architect systems, infrastructure and platforms using Linux and Amazon Web Services to support applications in the communications space

  • In depth Linux/Unix knowledge, good understanding the various linux kernel subsystems (memory, storage, network etc)

  • Working with Git, various git workflows

Followers: "Shwetha Quinita Dsouza, Nishant Das, Ayush Jindal, Devashish Sharma"
Description:
"About Flock
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.
 
With 30,000 businesses already using the platform we know that we are onto something big, and are now gearing up for a period of rapid growth.

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Resellerclub, Logicboxes and BigRock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.
"

"We are looking for a dynamic and passionate leader to grow and steer the global business operations, strategy and business development initiatives for one of our leading brands (domain endings) - .STORE Domains.

.STORE Domains was launched in June 2016 and since then has seen positive acceptance from the global retail and ecommerce community. There are over 185K domains registered across the globe with top-notch brands, influencers and musicians such as Emirates (www.emirates.store), Lorde (www.lorde.store), Khalid (www.khalid.store) and also thousands of retailers using .STORE for their online presence.

As Brand Manager your goal will be to make sure that your domain extension becomes the preferred choice for your target audience worldwide. You will be managing growth  while keeping a keen eye on financial health, brand awareness, consumer adoption and profitability of the brand. 
"
ListContent1:
"
  • P&L Management: You will be responsible for owning and driving the P&L for .STORE.
  • Strategy and Marketing: You will head the vision, strategy and implementation of marketing and business development activities for . STORE. Activities will include online and offline sales and marketing initiatives such as: direct marketing, events & conferences, strategic partnerships with the retail ecosystem, online marketing, social media, PR, viral marketing etc.
  • Growth Management: You will build and execute a growth driven strategy to achieve market dominance in the extremely competitive market for new gTLDs.
  • Channel Management: You will actively partner with the channel sales team to develop strong partnerships with registrars (distributors) worldwide to grow the business' topline.
  • People Management: You will identify, recruit and manage an effective and passionate team of high-caliber individuals in order to effectively achieve business objectives.
  • You will be hands on and involved in both the breadth and depth for all of the above functions and tasks.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Should be a seasoned strategy and marketing professional with over 5 years of overall experience, of which at least 3 years have been spent in leading marketing initiatives preferably in the Internet industry.
  • In addition to being Web 2.0 savy, is also proficient in field of online marketing.
  • Should be an astute strategist - possess the natural ability to sense opportunity and focus on key differentiators.
  • Should be a hustler who is target-driven, extremely motivated and does not stop until results are achieved.
  • Has immaculate written and oral communication skills.
  • Has a strong career trajectory.
  • Preferably, has a MBA from a Tier 1 Business School.
"

Description:
"As an Events & Marketing Associate, you will be part of a dynamic marketing team and will have a dedicated focus on creating, managing and executing marketing activities at events & conferences for Radix and its TLDs. These events are spread out globally and will require you to create and sustain strong business relationships with entities across the world.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Undertake regular tasks to facilitate a well-organized team; including processing payments, documenting expenses and managing logistics
  • Assist the team by completing projects and workflows to meet deadlines
  • Maintain logs and spreadsheets for all activities
  • Liaison regularly with vendors/suppliers as well as internal teams for various events
  • Responsible for all internal & external communications for all events
  • Manage merchandise and inventory for all events
  • Manage detailed MIS
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
• Has past experience in running/participating at international events & conferences
  • Has strong communication & is able to convey complex ideas easily
  • Knowledge of Microsoft Office
  • Highly organized and detail oriented
  • Proactive with the ability to manage things with minimal supervision

Description:
"About Flock

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Bhavin has also been the Founder / Co-Founder of Directi( Linkedin's top companies, 2018), Radix, Ringo, Codechef and Zeta. These businesses comprise of 1500+ people, 8+ offices, 10+ million customers, revenues over $250+ million and a group enterprise value of over $1.4 billion.

Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app that aims at increasing productivity and improving team-communication in organizations of all shapes and sizes. At Flock, we believe that enterprise communication should be richer and efficient. With that goal, we have developed and deployed an outstanding suite of products that enhances workplace communication and productivity.

Flock’s feature set includes:
- Secure one on one chat/ Group chat
- Video conferencing
- Audio Conferencing
- Process Automation - Real time business process and workflow automation
- Mailing lists… and much more

With teams at companies like Avendus, Gini and Jony, 1mg, Voonik, Yepme and Healthkart improving their workplace collaboration using Flock, we are already helping teams have richer and more efficient communication around the globe.
"
Additional:
"Additional Resources
Recommended - Detailed Intro to Flock
Flock Intro video
Flock vs Slack video
About Flock’s Platform
Our Youtube Channel

Client Case Studies
How Ituran improved communication with Flock
How Dietitians on demand increased efficiency with Flock
How Hiyo created a virtual office for remote teams with Flock

Benefits and Perks
We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth. 
And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our workspaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!
We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal.
If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Write clear, consistent, concise user-interface content, emails, notifications, product tours, content for marketing collaterals/brochures, ads, videos - keeping our user base in mind
  • Develop product names and narratives for early stage products.
  • Champion a cohesive brand story across our entire ecosystem of product offerings.
  • Collaborate with marketers, researchers, prototypers, product managers, and engineers to deliver compelling UX solutions.
  • Act as a subject matter expert, present and rationalize your work to stakeholders.
  • Leverage data and research to evaluate content’s impact.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • You have a Bachelor's or Master's degree in English, communication, public relations or journalism (preferable)
  • 4+ years of experience in an agency, corporate advertising, or marketing department
  • The ability to write crisp and clear content/copy in a variety of styles with accurate spelling and grammar
  • Creative bent of mind (humor and quirk would be a huge plus)
  • You have a flair for ideating and building creative content
  • You are very hands onYou are passionate about building a brand in the consumer web space
  • You are active on social media and familiar with social media tools and marketing processes
"

Followers: "Upali Sarkar, Benjamin David Pointing, Beezan Charna, Ralph Paul"
Description:
"The Sales Development Representative (SDR) is responsible for identifying and qualifying sales opportunities for Flock. This position lays the foundation for a highly rewarding future in tech. sales. 
To be clear this is not cold calling. You will be expected to conduct research on all prospects and only reach out to those where there is a possible fit. The purpose of the role is not to directly sell the product but instead learn a little bit about the prospects business, educate the prospect on the enterprise messaging space and if there is a potential fit for their business and ours, generate enough curiosity to secure a meeting with the appropriate stakeholders.
For the first year you will help cultivate leads for Account Executives (members of the team who are responsible for closing the final deal). After about a  year, depending on performance, you will start to be assigned leads of your own, putting you on the pathway to becoming a Account Executive, a role which carries great earning potential.

"
ListContent1:
"
  • To support the growth of Flock user base through Inside Sales techniques (phone  conversations, voicemail, email and social media)
  • Quickly and effectively research all assigned leads, providing a clear understanding of the prospect & company.
  • Educate prospects on the enterprise messaging space.
  • Furthermore, being willing and able to share relevant information about trends developing in the prospects industry.
  • Be utterly committed to following established processes and meeting SLA’s in a high quality fashion.
  • Work with existing lead sources and generate own leads through research.
  • Not be afraid to respectfully challenge customers and push for a ‘close’(meeting/demo) where it makes sense for the customer and for us.
  • Gain a fundamental understanding of the Flock product such that you can convincingly and concisely convey the benefits too prospects
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 0- 1 years of experience into Inside Sales, Sales Support or Lead generation.
  • Successful track record in a consultative/solution sales environment.
  • Candidate should have extensive inside sales experience selling to foreign countries.
  • You should be target driven - there are targets for everything in this role - you should love working in this sort of environment.
  • You should be curious - you want to understand how prospect’s businesses work and it is no effort for you to keep on top of trends in the tech. space.
  • You are a self starter - if you can’t reach a particular prospect through one channel/contact - you won’t wait for instruction - you will automatically looks for alternative routes etc.
  • Strong presentation skills and the ability to articulate product concept over the phone to prospects.A knack to simplify and explain technology to prospects.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

"

Description:
"What is the Job like?

As an intern you will engage in product engineering efforts at Flock and work with world class dev teams to develop game-changing, globally distributed, Web 2.0 products used by millions worldwide.

You will be involved in the entire lifecycle of a project, including strategy, vision, design, UX, coding, architecture, deployment etc, and will be chiefly expected to deliver clean, testable and well-designed code for the same.
"
ListTitle1: Who should apply for this post?
ListContent1:
"
  • You have the makings of an ace developer - impressive problem solving skills, sharp reasoning and a logical bent. You are passionate about programming and delivering, clean, test-covered, well-designed, scalable code.
  • You have a good grasp on programming fundamentals including OOPs, Design Patterns, algorithms, data structures, networking etc and are not rigid with respect to choice of technology, are relatively platform agnostic, and open to adopting the right technology for the task at hand.

  • Skills –

  • You are acquainted with / have mastered _a few_ of the below skills/tools -
  • Java, C#, PHP, Ruby, Python, C++, Javascript, WPF, Erlang, Haskell, LISP, Linux, Flex, XUL, Bash, Advanced Networking, Async IO, Routing, TCP/UDP, Postgres, Data structures, Advanced RDBMS, MySQL, MSSQL, neo4j, BDB, REST, SOAP, IPC, RPC, HTML, CSS, Ajax, Agile, TDD, XP, Scrum, caching, Load Balancing, Horizontal Partitioning, memcached, Multi-threading, Concurrency, Scalability, Unicode, Usability / Ux, MVC, Spring, Titanium, Ant, Watir, Selenium, Git, CVS, SVN, JIRA, ... _ad infinitum_

Bonus points –
  • - Knowledge of Agile development methodologies (XP, Scrum etc)
  • - Active Blogger
  • - Contribution to Open Source projects
  • - You wrote your first program on a ZX Spectrum (Add extra points if you still own the wicked cool box)
  • - Ability to rattle off the names of every planet from Issac Asimov's Foundation
  • - Trilogy in reverse alphabetical order
"

Followers: "Ameya Ayachit, Upali Sarkar, Janushi Saumil Shah, Nishant Das"
Description:
"What is the job like? 

As the Head of our Corporate IT function, you will direct all aspects of IT infrastructure including Corporate IT support, DC Operations, Procurement & 24/7 SOC/NOC functions across Directi offices and data centers. You will work closely with a team of highly technical infrastructure professionals, leading each said function, in executing the vision. Your role will also involve recruitment, training, mentoring and knowledge-sharing.

Corporate IT:
- Responsible for all aspects of Corporate IT Operations
- Deploy and manage internal infrastructure to support businesses
- Oversee end user support across Directi offices with a heterogeneous environment (Linux, OSX , -Windows)Formulate and implement an effective BCP/DR strategy for corporate services

Data center Operations:
- Responsible for all aspects of physical DC Operations across all Data Centers
- Capacity planning to ensure we have adequate bandwidth, space and power at all times
- Setting up new Data Centers as required by business

Network Operations:
- Manage all global networking infrastructure
- Work with team to effectively design, implement and maintain a secure network
- Deliver 99.99% network up time
- Formulate and implement effective DDOS mitigation strategy
- Work with RIR's like ARIN for IP/AS allocation etc

System Operations:
- Oversee the function of the 24X7 operations team
- Managing incident response

Procurement:
- Vendor relationship management
- Software/Hardware Asset Management
- Identify new Vendors/OEMs as required by the business from time to time

General:
- Create & maintain recruitment and training processes/documentation
- Continuously improve operational procedures for effective functioning of the business
- Automate manual processes
"
ListTitle1: You should apply for the role if:
ListContent1:
"
  • You have experience managing DC/IT operations for a high tech organisation for several years
  • You have managed a reasonably sized team in demanding environments (large scale enterprises, startups etc)
  • You have experience in setting up and running co-located data centers
  • Exposure to dealing with DC/Telecom vendors
  • You can effectively coach & drive people, work along with them in the trenches and can deliver results rapidly
  • You have good communication & people management skills
  • You have good understanding of Linux/Windows operating systems
  • You have good understanding of DNS & Networking fundamentals, JunOS/IOS and tech such as BGP, STP, JunOS, IOS, VRRP, LLDP, SNMP, OSPF etc
  • You believe in great customer service attitude & effective and decisive leadership
  • Ability to work with a distributed team across diverse geographical time zones
  • Open to domestic/international travel
"

Followers: "Janushi Saumil Shah, Neha Naik, Priyanka Damwani"
Description:
"Radix is an internet company with a large partner network; some of our global partners include GoDaddy, Google, BigRock, Zoho, etc. These channel partners contribute to 95% + of the revenue made by Radix. We are looking for a marketing maven to help us lead all marketing efforts targeted to these 200+ partners spread across the globe.  

As a Channel Marketing Manager, your goal will be to build and maintain high recall for Radix and all its domain endings portfolio amongst these partners. You will be the creator & custodian of all marketing and communication targeted to the channel, both online and offline.

You will be responsible for building & executing strategy for all aspects of Channel Marketing -  Events, Online Marketing, Content Creation, ROI measurement, PR & Social Media.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Content & Communications:
  • Creating a PR strategy targeting the channel & working with the content team to execute it.
  • Leading Partner Communications i.e. creation and distribution of - emails, monthly newsletters, presentations, infographics, white papers, event collaterals etc.
  • Support the channel team with presentations and data needed to make compelling pitches for Radix and its domain extensions.

  • Online Marketing:
  • Creating an annual calendar for Online Marketing Campaigns.
  • Ideating & driving execution of each of these by working with the design & web development teams.
  • Monitoring the impact of these campaigns with the online marketing team & recommending newer avenues or strategies that can be looked at.

  • Events:
  • Building the yearly event calendar & working to finalize budgets, sponsorships for each of these events. Suggesting  unique out of the box sponsorship opportunities.
  • Driving planning & communication with clients to co-partner/co-sponsor events, conferences, when required.
  • Working with the Events team to plan exciting social events & get-togethers for Partners.

  • Annual Planning, Budgeting & ROI Measurement:
  • Creating an annual marketing plan and budget. Ensuring all marketing activities are within the scope of the same.
  • Brainstorming and ideation of  new marketing initiatives that can be rolled out across the channel.
  • Creating & making quarterly presentations to review marketing activities and spends.
  • Closely monitoring ROI on investments made with channel partners.
  • Working with management to ensure deadlines & budgets are met every single time.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
• Experience:  
  • Should be a seasoned marketing professional with  3.6 - 8 yrs of marketing experience.
  • Experience in B2B/Partner Marketing or the Domain Industry is preferred but not necessary.

  • Skills:
  • Possesses strong marketing acumen.
  • Has very strong writing and communication skills.
  • Basic understanding of visual communication and marketing media.
  • Exceptional organization and planning skills.
  • Must be good at managing multiple activities & projects simultaneously.
  • Keen eye to detail.
  • Be a go-getter and has a can-do attitude.
  • Be a people's person and can use the gift of gab to get out of tricky situations.

ListContent1:
"
  • Drive closure of local IT user calls within the specified SLAs.
  • Coordinate with contractors/vendors, monitor progress of work, escalate delays and changes to the manager.
  • Review/Prepare Daily, Monthly and Quarterly call analysis report, call trend report and
  • Hardware failure report.
  • Co-ordinate with Manager & Engineers for any process, management changes or technical support changes.
  • Coordinate with Procurement team and ensure stock availability for daily operations.
  • Act as a reliable point of contact for the Service Desk team for issue escalations & nonstandard service requests.
  • Create conducive team-atmosphere by applying required motivation levels
  • Plan and execute maintenance schedules.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Graduation in IT is highly preferable.
  • Candidate should have good knowledge of IT products.
  • You have 1+ years of relevant experience
  • You possess strong problem solving skills with ability to organize and analyze data
  • You are confident, creative, proactive in taking initiatives and achieving them
  • You are a goal-oriented individual with a strong attention to detail
  • Should have basic knowledge of Mac, Linux and Network Installation, configuration and Managing of Windows 7 up to Windows 10 machines.
  • Should have excellent Windows Desktops OS troubleshooting skills including hardware troubleshooting skills.
  • Installation, configuration & management of Servers, WiFi Router and Network devices.
  • Installation and management of mail applications like MS Outlook and Thunderbird.
  • Should have hands-on experience with Google Apps (Gmail, Google Docs, etc)
  • Monitoring of Servers and Network devices to ensure minimal downtime.
  • Inventory management for hardware and softwares.
  • Backups and profile migration for users co-ordination with vendors for timely resolutions on hardware related calls.
  • Manage centralized Kaspersky Antivirus server, WSUS, WDS, File & Print services
  • Basic knowledge of DHCP, DNS, SCCM and good knowledge of RAID
  • Should know how to upgrade firmware and BIOS
  • User and security access management using Active Directory Services
"

Followers: "Janushi Saumil Shah, Ameya Ayachit, Poppin Mathias"
Description:
"As a Talent Acquisition Associate, you will be working in partnership with various business stakeholders to define the sourcing strategy, generate high caliber talents and close top candidates; all within a fast-moving and super dynamic environment. Being part of a creative and growth driven team, your major goal will include connecting dots between manpower requirements and business goals.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • You will be responsible for the entire life-cycle of non- tech recruitment at Directi, including strategy, sourcing, short-listing, pitching, communication, coordination, scheduling and negotiation.
  • Identifying and engaging high-quality prospects and candidates by utilizing advanced internet searching skills, job boards, social networking, database mining, referrals and cold calling.
  • Managing applicant tracking system, maintain accurate candidate documentation to ensure legal compliance with employment practices, policies, procedures, and regulations.
  • Gain market intelligence by talent mapping and performing competitor analysis for a specific function.
  • You will be our brand ambassador, and evangelise Directi to potential candidates.
  • Thinking of creative and “out of the box” recruitment strategies for continuous development.
  • Define and implement creative marketing strategies and campaigns to attract potential top talent from the industry.
  • Maximize ROI on recruitment costs and increase recruitment efficiencies.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • You should have 1- 3 years of experience into recruitment.
  • You (preferably) have a relevant post graduate degree (MBA/Masters in an HR discipline).You have exceptional communication skills - written and spoken.
  • Considerable experience with myriad sourcing strategies including portals, job posts, social networking, conferences, headhunting etc.
  • Demonstrable creativity with respect to sourcing candidates.
  • Well versed with technology and associated jargon. Ability to discuss technology to a limited extent as required by the profile.
  • Ability to grasp and deliver an excellent pitch to potential candidates.
  • Keen sense of searching for and identifying exceptionally talented candidates.
  • Experience with using new age media such as social network, linkedin, blogs etc.
  • Experience in defining and implementing online marketing campaigns through social media, search marketing etc.
  • Process oriented: Demonstrable commitment to defining, documenting and following processes and workflows.
"

Description:
"The SAP SuccessFactors System Administrator supports the company's people strategy, processes and tools, so leaders can identify, manage and develop their talent. This position reports to Corporate HR and is responsible for assisting in the configuration, implementation and maintenance of the SAP SuccessFactors system.

You will be responsible for supporting the implementation, configuration, maintenance, operation, and ongoing administration of our SAP SuccessFactors system. You will ensure that HR systems and related procedures adhere to organizational processes, policies and guidelines.

SuccessFactors journey:

Onboard - understanding the ‘who, what, when, where, why’ of SuccessFactors
Implement - working with consultants(PwC) to configure the solutions, test, and plan for roll-out.
Launch - complete the roll-out of SF solution and understand the required processes and tasks to support the live solution
Utilize - drive adoption among the end users
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Partner with HR Leadership and business process owners to configure, maintain, and operate the environment to support our business processes.
  • Oversee the daily administration of the SAP SuccessFactors system for goals, performance, succession, career development.
  • Test all system areas during implementation, upgrade and/or other configuration change.
  • Resolve problems related to upgrades, releases, fixes, and improvements.
  • Provide end user support to ensure adoption and ease of use
  • Partner with team members and HR Business Partners to ensure alignment and knowledge transfer.
  • Lead periodic system review meetings and communicate out process timelines, deadlines, and future agenda topics.
  • Provide support on the application by working with the HR application owners and the vendor's support staff .
  • Maintain SAP SuccessFactors security, users and permissions, security groups, rights management.
  • Work with SAP SuccessFactors to keep up-to-date on quarterly release system specifications, leading system changes, and communicating updates to impacted partners.
"
ListTitle2: Who can apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Experience in Success Factors Implementation or Administration will be considered a plus.
  • Demonstrate strong critical thinking and analytical reasoning skills
  • Ability to work on multiple priorities effectively.
  • Advanced MS excel skills
  • Ability to execute assigned project tasks within established schedule
  • Ability to communicate in the service of users and colleagues
  • Positive relationship skills – both internal and external (vendor)
  • Experience gathering and consolidating requirements from multi-functional groups
  • Strong analytical skills
  • Excellent time management skills, ability to lead multiple priorities simultaneously, meet deadlines, and work in a dynamic environment
  • Professional oral and written communicator with all levels of management
  • Dedication to results, leadership, teamwork, process improvement and good interpersonal skills
  • Ability to maintain confidentiality
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Maintaining accounting processes of a predetermined set of Business Units/Products/Expense Categories
  • Passing accounting entries (journals, debit notes, credit notes, receipts, payments)
  • Processing and reviewing reconciliation statements (Bank, Debtors, Creditors and any other Payment Gateways, ledgers)
  • Bank Reconciliation of various banks including foreign banks
  • Debtors management and Ageing analysis
  • Payments disbursement on multiple payment platforms after verifying & approval from Management
  • Updating the payments made to customers on the online interface
  • Monthly reconciliation of advances made to creditors
  • Assisting in finalization of accounts and tax audits
  • Banking and compliance tasks
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 3-5 years’ experience in maintaining books of accounts, preferably in an IT company
  • Should be proficient in advanced Microsoft Excel and Tally ERP.
  • Minimum B.com Graduate
  • Additional qualifications would be an added advantage
  • Excellent in Microsoft excel ( vlookup, hlookup, countif, sumif, pivot tables, etc)
  • Good verbal and written communication skills.
  • Excellent understanding of various fundamentals and concepts of bookkeeping and accounting
  • Good knowledge of Tally ERP and MS Office
  • Working knowledge of Income Tax, GST and various Accounting Standards
  • Should have an eye for detail
  • Team player and a self-motivated person.
  • Should have an ability and willingness to guide and assist peers.
"

Description:
"Looking for a dynamic, young, meticulous Executive Assistant for our CEO based out of HQ in Mumbai.
"
Additional:
"Benefits & Perks

Directians love their jobs, and not just because we offer the most competitive salaries in the industry. Our excellent benefits include everything from great medical and life insurance to catered meals. Our workspaces are comfortable and fun, complete with bean bag chairs, ping pong tables, and all the snacks you can eat. We have no dress code (tee-shirts are a-ok!). We have flexible work hours and flexible holidays, which means that teams pick their own work hours. Directi has its own concierge desk that doubles up as a travel agency?

We are passionate about building the next generation of web products, and we believe that happy directians are the key to achieving this goal. If you like the idea of working in an exciting workspace on cutting-edge internet products that make a truly global impact (and wearing flip-flops to work), then we want to get to know you!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Manage travel arrangements for the CEO (including but not limited to visa arrangements, ticket bookings, cab arrangements, hotel bookings etc.)
  • Coordinate and maintain the calendar including organizing all appointments, meetings, conferences all across the world etc.
  • Follow-ups and Follow-throughs with internal teams.
  • Managing phone calls, routine emails and correspondence with vendors and clients within India and Internationally.
  • Maintain strong follow-up systems for timely completion of projects/assignments and keeping the CEO updated on any developments, status reports related to ongoing projects.
  • Work on ad hoc research projects and ensure timely completion with 100% accuracy and eye for detailing.
  • Managing personal tasks including managing petty cash.
  • Should be high on integrity and able to maintain confidentiality in day to day operations.
  • Open to travel internationally and work in flexible shifts - India and UK shifts (on rotation basis).
  • Organizing and servicing Meetings, social gatherings and events.
  • Remain up-to-date with the latest trends and events in the industry.
  • Creating Presentations, summary reports and budgets as and when required by the CEO.
  • Should have a Go Getter attitude and must be a team player.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 2+ years of work experience preferably in Executive Assistant / Secretarial activities.
  • Strong conceptual thinker with strong analytical skills.
  • Immaculate written and oral communication skills with the ability to take ownership of one's work.
  • Process oriented: Demonstrable commitment to following processes, documentation etc.
  • Proficient at using the Internet, and demonstrable technical aptitude / inclination.
  • Intelligent with good logical reasoning.
  • Proactive with a Go-getter attitude.
  • Prior experience working with successful entrepreneur(s) preferred.
"

Followers: "Ralph Paul, Anup Kalbalia, Tojo Chacko, Pallavi Khandelwal"
ListContent1:
• Brainstorm and ideate on creative marketing activities for various events.
  • Plan and roll out marketing campaigns effectively to reach target audiences.
  • Monitor and focus on user retention/engagement on various channels.
  • Manage the brand of the program across various online and offline channels.
  • Coordinate and support volunteers
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Have very strong writing and communication skills.
  • Have strong attention to detail.
  • Be good at managing multiple activities & projects
  • Be a go-getter and has a can-do attitude
  • Be highly motivated and energetic team player, with excellent interpersonal skills
  • Have an ability to complete large volumes of work quickly and independently with a high level of drive, initiative, and self-motivation.
  • Have an ability to manage time effectively, set priorities and meet deadlines.
  • Be logical and a problem solver
  • Prior experience in one or more of these lines of work such as social media management/content planning
  • Knowledge of computer programming.
"

Description:
"As a TA Operations Associate, you will be supporting a team of seasoned Talent Scouts to help with managing the overall candidate experience along with building/ maintaining a complaint recruitment operations process. 

"
ListContent1:
"
  • Take full ownership of managing all offered candidates post offer acceptance.
  • Manage the pre- onboarding process for all offered candidates including but not limited to preparing offer letters, assisting them with documentation, coordinating with IT to set up systems, administering background checks and supporting HR Advisors with weekly inductions to ensure a positive onboarding experience.
  • To be the point of contact for all candidate inquiries on background verification, onboarding, travel coordination, offer letters etc.
  • Ensure compliance for every step in the recruitment operations lifecycle.
  • To be the perfect host to all our candidates starting from a vibrant hello to a warm good bye for all onsite interviews.
  • Ensure all background verification documents and approvals related to any employee case is properly sealed and audit ready.
  • Work with recruiters to maintain the recruitment database and generate reports for the team to identify shortcomings and suggest process recommendations to achieve operational excellence.
  • Keep challenging the status quo by re-thinking, re-building and re-initiating processes that need improvements and make them more effective & efficient.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Graduate in any stream.
  • Has 0-2 years of experience in HR or Recruitment operations.
  • Should either be well versed with Excel or should have an incline to learn it.
  • Strong inclination towards attention to detail. So, obsession with perfection is always welcome.
  • Well-spoken and eloquent in emails.
  • Should understand how stressful a job hunt can be for a candidate and reflect the same in all communications that go out.
  • Flexible, fearless, and excited to build bigger and better processes for the team.
  • Knowledge of using MS Excel or zeal to learn and pick it up quickly.
"

Followers: "Janushi Saumil Shah, Anup Kalbalia, Poppin Mathias"
ListContent1:
"
  • Undertake regular tasks to facilitate a well-organized team; including processing payments, documenting expenses and managing logistics
  • Assist the team by completing projects and workflows to meet deadlines
  • Maintain logs and spreadsheets for all activities
  • Liaison regularly with vendors/suppliers as well as internal teams for various events
  • Responsible for all internal & external communications for all events
  • Manage merchandise and inventory for all events
  • Manage detailed MIS
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
• Has past experience in running/participating at international events & conferences
  • Has strong communication & is able to convey complex ideas easily
  • Knowledge of Microsoft Office
  • Highly organized and detail oriented
  • Proactive with the ability to manage things with minimal supervision

Description:
"About Flock

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Bhavin has also been the Founder / Co-Founder of Media.net, Directi, Radix, Ringo, Codechef and Zeta. These businesses comprise of 1500+ people, 8+ offices, 10+ million customers, revenues over $250+ million and a group enterprise value of over $1.4 billion.

Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app that aims at increasing productivity and improving team-communication in organizations of all shapes and sizes. At Flock, we believe that enterprise communication should be richer and efficient. With that goal, we have developed and deployed an outstanding suite of products that enhances workplace communication and productivity.

Flock’s feature set includes :
- Secure one on one chat/ Group chat
- Video conferencing
- Audio Conferencing
- Process Automation
- Real time business process and workflow automation
- Mailing lists… and much more

With teams at companies like Tim Hortons, Victorinox, Aranca, Mothercare, Ricoh and Ituran improving their workplace collaboration using Flock, we are already helping teams have richer and more efficient communication around the globe.

As an iOS engineer at Flock, you will be creating and contributing to multiple products using latest iOS technologies within a passionate team of world class engineers. You will be working and coordinating with various product managers, designers and engineers.  High commitment to problem solving skills, creation of quality output and constant learning is essential.
"
Additional:
"Benefits and Perks

We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth. 
And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our works places are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!
We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal.
If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Design and build applications for multiple products on iOS platform
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness aspect of applications
  • Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
  • Ownership of identifying, correcting bottlenecks and fixing bugs.Help maintain code quality and organization of code.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Proficient with Swift or Objective-C
  • Good problem solving and design skills
  • Experience with iOS frameworks such as Cocoa Touch, Core Data, Networking, etc.
  • Experience with threading, and performance tuning
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
  • Understanding of Apple’s design principles and interface guidelines
  • Experience with performance and memory tuning with tools such as Instruments.
  • Proficient understanding of Git
"

Followers: "Manika Dhamija, Devashish Sharma, Shwetha Quinita Dsouza, Bhavik Maganlal Kaklotar, Kalpesh Patel"
Description:
"About Flock
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.
 
With 30,000 businesses already using the platform we know that we are onto something big, and are now gearing up for a period of rapid growth.

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Resellerclub, Logicboxes and BigRock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.

Role Overview
As a front end engineer at Flock, you will create products that use leading-edge web technologies within a passionate team of world-class engineers. You will contribute to the technical strategy and tactics for the Flock web platform while implementing the client side code across Flock web properties. The ideal candidate is energized by making a business impact, is an expert in web front end development with strengths in HTML5 and single-page apps, and enjoys working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment alongside other exceptional people.
"

ListContent2:
"
  • You have experience in end-to-end product building. You have an experimental mindset and are not afraid to try new things
  • Proficiency with Javascript, HTML, CSS, and experience in at least one modern JavaScript framework
  • You’re a craftsperson who cares deeply about UI and user experience, and you love pairing with designers to create and ship beautiful, delightful experiences.
  • 2+ years of experience in building Single page applications using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript
  • Knowledge of Design Patterns is a must
  • Good knowledge of using SVGs to build complex graphs
  • Experience with unit tests, integration tests, continuous integration systems (such as Jekins/Travis), deployment and operations automation

  • You have built progressive web apps
  • You have run Node.js cluster for a web application
  • Experience in working with any server-side technologies
  • You know how to reduce loading time under 1 second and render content at 60fps jank free
  • You truly understand what “this” is, and you have an opinion about whether it’s a good thing or a bad thing
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Support Business Team in designing the training outline.
  • Conduct Training Need Analysis or customization study as required by the business unit.
  • Coordinate training schedule with the business locally and the training co-ordinator.
  • Design modules/content/quizzes with support from content team.
  • Responsible for Training Delivery.
  • Training Evaluation: Test trainees to measure progress and evaluate effectiveness of training sessions.
  • Follow-up with Operations/clients.
  • Analyzing performance metrics and planning for further trainings in collaboration with the Training Head.
  • Reports on progress of employees under guidance during training periods.
  • Conducts training sessions covering specified areas such as induction, on-the-job training, refresher training, and calendar programs etc.
  • Regularly updating training content in collaboration with the Content Head.
  • Reference to Market need, designing New Training Modules and briefing the Sales team.
"
ListTitle2: Who can apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Should have 8+ years of experience, with minimum 5 years into Content Development.
  • Should have experience delivering Leadership Training.
  • MBA / PGDM Diploma/Degree.
  • Any reliable training certifications is an added advantage.
  • Should have experience imparting training on soft skills & behavioural training.
  • Should have excellent communication skills.
  • Should be assertive, approachable and mature.
  • Task oriented and excellent team player.
  • Active, energetic & self-driven.
  • Should have the ability to deliver results and handle pressure.
  • Willing to travel anywhere in the country should the need arise.
  • Should be comfortable with MS- Power point, excel & spreadsheets.
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Design customer service processes that scale at every point in the customer lifecycle including sales, onboarding and retention.
  • Review and improvise existing policies to scale up on existing quality standards
  • Recruit, train and build professional development plans for the customer facing team.
  • Monitoring team performance, productivity and service levels on an ongoing basis.
  • Drive the vision for Customer Experience at Flock across Inbound and Outbound customer channels including social media channels.
  • Evolve processes for inspecting and sampling the customer interaction process at every stage from contact to resolution and follow-up.
  • Review team and business performance statistics, determine and document areas that may need improvement.
  • Be the voice of the customer in the leadership team working closely with product, marketing and engineering teams to implement insights and product improvements to continuously improve customer experience.
  • Participate in the product planning process to ensure that features requested by customers are prioritized and implemented.
  • Establish formal service level agreements for commitments to internal and external stakeholders, and iteratively improve upon delivery standards.
  • Track and review performance of the team on a consistent basis, conduct feedback sessions with team members.
  • Use data to inform all layers of our operating processes and strategic direction—such as the timing of customer touch points and how we ensure consistent customer outcomes
  • Work closely with sales to set up a process to manage our on website chat and ensure maximum lead conversion
  • Own our online support documentation and work with marketing and product to ensure it is updated
  • Work with PM, sales and other stakeholders to set up processes for priority support, phone support and define an escalation matrix
  • Plan initiatives to empower the support team to transition into a more solutioning function hence reducing dependency on Product Management
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Should have been with the current team for at least 15 months. Exceptions can be made if the reporting Manager is of the opinion that the individual’s strengths will be utilized more effectively in a different team. 
  • Should have a consistently good track record of performance (based on regular internal and customer feedback, performance measurement on key performance indicators of the current role).
  • 8+ years of experience building and leading teams that deliver exceptional customer experiences.
  • Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
  • Excellent interpersonal, organizational, leadership and mentoring ability.
  • Good negotiation and empathy skills with customer-oriented attitude.
  • Demonstrated ability to hire, promote and develop talent.
  • Flair for analysis and creating insightful reports.
  • Rigorous attention to detail.
  • Excellent analytical abilities to grasp the key points from complicated details.
  • Well-versed with the tools, concepts and methodologies of customer support management.
  • Demonstrable expertise in defining SLAs and building processes to ensure adherence.
  • Fundamental knowledge of internet technology and functionally applicable software to infer statistical data.
"

Flock is seeking an experienced Software Engineer to join the Platform Team. The Platform team is responsible for building and managing large distributed components that run Flock. We handle everything from Core Messaging Infrastructure, Messaging Storage, Flock platform to Analytics. We are looking for engineers who are passionate about solving complex problems and building platforms at scale.
"
Additional:
"Benefits and Perks
We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth. 
And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our workspaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!
We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal.
If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Design and develop large scale distributed services
  • Design and implement new user-facing features
  • Take ownership of one or more components of the platform and drive innovation in your area of ownership
  • Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, stability, and security of the platform as a whole
  • Work closely with product management and UX design teams to define and refine feature specifications
  • Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables
  • Participate actively in recruitment and nurturing of engineers as awesome as you
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Should have been with the current team for at least 15 months. Exceptions can be made if the reporting Manager is of the opinion that the individual’s strengths will be utilized more effectively in a different team.
  • Should have a consistently good track record of performance (based on regular internal and customer feedback, performance measurement on key performance indicators of the current role).
  • Solid foundation in computer science with strong competency in data structures, algorithms and software design
  • Java expert. Experience with golang, python or other languages is a plus
  • Good understanding of nuances of distributed systems, scalability and availability
  • Good knowledge of one or more relational and NoSQL databases and transactions
  • In-depth understanding of concurrency, synchronization, NIO, memory allocation and GC
  • Experience with IaaS clouds like AWS/Google Cloud, Azure, OpenStack etc
  • Experience in a startup environment is a plus
  • Good communication skills. Putting your thoughts through to other stakeholders in a cohesive manner is not a problem for you.
"

Description:
"About Flock

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Bhavin has also been the Founder / Co-Founder of Media.net, Directi, Radix, Ringo, Codechef and Zeta. These businesses comprise of 1500+ people, 8+ offices, 10+ million customers, revenues over $250+ million and a group enterprise value of over $1.4 billion.

Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app that aims at increasing productivity and improving team-communication in organizations of all shapes and sizes. At Flock, we believe that enterprise communication should be richer and efficient. With that goal, we have developed and deployed an outstanding suite of products that enhances workplace communication and productivity.

Flock’s feature set includes :
- Secure one on one chat/ Group chat
- Video conferencing
- Audio Conferencing
- Process Automation
- Real time business process and workflow automation
- Mailing lists… and much more

With teams at companies like Tim Hortons, Victorinox, Aranca, Mothercare, Ricoh and Ituran improving their workplace collaboration using Flock, we are already helping teams have richer and more efficient communication around the globe.

As a front end engineer at Flock, you will create products that use leading-edge web technologies within a passionate team of world-class engineers. You will contribute to the technical strategy and tactics for the Flock web platform while implementing the client side code across Flock web properties. The ideal candidate is energized by making a business impact, is an expert in web front end development with strengths in HTML5 and single-page apps, and enjoys working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment alongside other exceptional people.
"
Additional:
"Benefits and Perks
We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth. 
And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our workspaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!
We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal.
If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Design and build a web ecosystem that drives the business and meets the functional needs of our customers and partners.
  • Optimize web applications to maximize speed and scale. Support diverse clients from high powered desktop computers to small footprint mobile devices.
  • Write client-side/backend code for web-based applications, create fast, easy-to-use, high volume production applications, and develop prototypes quickly.
  • Maintain high coding standards and cross-functional interaction with other Flock teams.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Should have been with the current team for at least 15 months. Exceptions can be made if the reporting Manager is of the opinion that the individual’s strengths will be utilized more effectively in a different team.
  • Should have a consistently good track record of performance (based on regular internal and customer feedback, performance measurement on key performance indicators of the current role).
  • 2+ years of experience in building Single page applications using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
  • Experience in working with any server side technologies.
  • Good knowledge of one or more of client side MV* frameworks (such as React, Angular, Backbone + Marionette)
  • Knowledge of Design Patterns is a must.
  • Good knowledge of using SVGs to build complex graphs.
  • Experience with unit tests, integration tests, continuous integration systems (such as Jekins/Travis), deployment and operations automation.
"
ListContent3:
"
  • You have built progressive web apps
  • You have run Node.js cluster for a web application serving millions of users.
  • You know how to reduce loading time under 1 second and render content at 60fps jank free
  • You keep little photographs of Doug Crockford and Brendan Eich in your wallet.
  • You think closures and anonymous self-executing inner-functions can solve most of the world’s problems.
  • You truly understand what “this” is, and you have an opinion about whether it’s a good thing or a bad thing.
"

Followers: "Deepak Rathod, Manika Dhamija, Devashish Sharma, Shwetha Quinita Dsouza"

As an iOS engineer at Flock, you will be creating and contributing to multiple products using latest iOS technologies within a passionate team of world class engineers. You will be working and coordinating with various product managers, designers and engineers.  High commitment to problem solving skills, creation of quality output and constant learning is essential.
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Design and build applications for multiple products on iOS platform
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness aspect of applications
  • Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
  • Ownership of identifying, correcting bottlenecks and fixing bugs.Help maintain code quality and organization of code.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Should have been with the current team for at least 15 months. Exceptions can be made if the reporting Manager is of the opinion that the individual’s strengths will be utilized more effectively in a different team.
  • Should have a consistently good track record of performance (based on regular internal and customer feedback, performance measurement on key performance indicators of the current role).
  • Proficient with Swift or Objective-C
  • Good problem solving and design skills
  • Experience with iOS frameworks such as Cocoa Touch, Core Data, Networking, etc.
  • Experience with threading, and performance tuning
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services

  • Experience with performance and memory tuning with tools such as Instruments.
  • Proficient understanding of Git
"

Description:
"About Flock
Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Resellerclub, Logicboxes and BigRock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.
 
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.
 
With 30,000 businesses already using the platform we know that we are onto something big, and are now gearing up for a period of rapid growth.

We are looking for a talented individual to join our DevOps and Platforms Engineering team. You will play an important role in helping build and run our globally distributed infrastructure stack and platforms. Technologies you can expect to work on every day include Linux, AWS, MySQL/PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Hadoop/HBase, ElasticSearch, FreeSwitch, Jenkins, Nagios, and CFEngine amongst others.
"
