ListContent1:
"
  • Create an 'always-on' approach to marketing by looking at our customer's entire journey, across all devices and channels, and then draft and optimize messaging to align with the various touch points along our customer’s journey
  • Drive the vision, strategy and copy around our lifecycle efforts specifically for email/CRM, in-app messaging (using tools like AppCues or WalkMe), and working withour performance marketing team to ensure alignment with our PPC campaigns
  • Work collaboratively with other GTM teams (growth, ops, and content) to optimize our customer segmentation, lifecycle trigger points, transactional messaging, and large-scale campaigns
  • Draft copy that pulls the customer through our funnel specifically focusing on sign-up through monetization, across multiple geographies and customer personas
  • Working with marketing ops & product automate and deeply personalize campaigns 
"
ListTitle2: Who can apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 4+ years of experience in B2C or high volume/high velocity marketing, specifically CRM email marketing or onboarding marketing or lifecycle marketing, using marketing automation tools (HubSpot a plus)
  • Experience in the end-to-end design, development and management of lifecycle marketing programs and strategies
  • Have a knack for placing themselves in the shoes of the customers and building
  • customer insights that can lead to a solid understanding of customer journeys
  • Track record of driving cultural change and influencing organizations through communications.
  • Exceptional writing skills, with the ability to formulate a clear point of view with concise communication
  • An agile, flexible individual with a “can-do,” problem-solving approach to managing ambiguity.
  • A curious self-starter with a proven track record of diving into unknown territory and learning new concepts.
"

Followers: "Deepika Joshi, Anup Kalbalia, Chanukya Patnaik, Smruti Shirodkar, Smruti Shirodkar"
Description:
"About the role
As a Marketing Manager, you will get an opportunity to work on devising and executing the marketing strategy, branding management, and PR and communications for CodeChef. The work will have a direct impact on the outreach, growth, revenue, and impact of the initiative. An ideal candidate must be a detail-oriented marketeer, with experience in  

- Acquisition
- Evangelism 
- Campaign and Creative Development
- Strategy
- Data Analysis
- Optimization
- Digital Marketing
- Offline/Events Marketing
- Content Marketing
- Branding and PR

Responsibilities
- Acquire new customers via CodeChef’s digital and offline marketing channels 
- Analyze campaign performance data to drive continuous improvement and hypothesis-led testing of new concepts 
- Plan and successfully manage the campaign budgets 
- Develop weekly, monthly, and ad-hoc reporting on performance by channel
- Develop best practices and define KPIs for managing marketing success
- Proactively identify opportunities and create new marketing partnerships
- Branding and PR Communication   
- Setup processes and grow the team
- Must stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online/offline marketing and measurement 

Scope
- Digital Marketing
		> SEO
		> Social media
				* Engagement
				* Reputation management 
		> Ads - FB/Google Ads
		> Email marketing
		> Running referral campaigns
		> Landing page optimization
		> Launching product feature/new releases – product/program specific

- Offline/Channel marketing
		> Campus Chapters/Representatives
		> College Fests
		> Conducting offline events

- Content Marketing/PR
		> Blog - product related, contests related, community-related interest topics, etc
		> Testimonials
		> Encourage press to write about us
		> Encourage influencers to write about us

What should you possess
- Passion for storytelling that leads to creating and defining authentic messages for diverse audiences
- Solid understanding of direct-response and performance marketing
- Familiarity with performance tracking and measurement (i.e. cookies, pixels, UTMs, attribution windows)
- A strong understanding of different conversion attribution methodologies, including last click, algorithmic/multi-touch, etc
- Paid advertising background on Facebook, Linkedin, and Adwords
- Understanding of advertising metrics (e.g. CPM, CPA, ROAS, LTV) 
- Ability to manage large datasets and perform both qualitative and quantitative analysis. 
- Energetic, self-starter, and a team player
- Entrepreneurial spirit and drive with strong attention to detail
- A desire to do both strategic planning and daily execution/optimization, as needed 
- Ability to multi-task and work independently

Experience
- 4 - 8 years

Annual Salary Range
- Rs. 8,00,000 - Rs. 16,00,000 
"

"About the role 
As a Business Development Lead, you will get an opportunity to work on strategizing the growth of CodeChef’s monetization routes. The work will have a direct impact on the growth and revenue of the business. 

Responsibilities
- Identifying potential leads, developing and executing strategic alliances to generate revenue
- Develop and execute a comprehensive account plan, evaluate benefits of association with prospects
- Manage end to end partner relations including pitching and negotiation
- Brainstorm and ideate creative marketing ideas to increase product adoption & awareness
- Planning and rolling out marketing campaigns to effectively reach target audiences
- Establish best practices in digital marketing and stay up-to-date with digital technologies and developments
- Generate and analyze campaign reports, followed by suggesting solutions to boost sales and partners

What should you possess
- An engineering graduate degree
- 2 - 5 years of experience in technology related sales or business development
- Immaculate communication skills and can deliver the most effective targeted pitches
- Sharp business acumen and a penchant for marketing internet products
- You should be highly numerate and believe in measuring and analyzing everything you possibly can
- An ability to complete large volumes of work quickly and independently with a high level of drive, initiative, and self-motivation
- Should be dynamic with strategy formulation and acceptance of idea with logical reasoning
- Have an ability to complete large volumes of work quickly and independently with a high level of drive, initiative and self-motivation.

Experience
- 2 - 5 Years

Annual Salary Range 
- Rs. 6,00,000 - Rs. 12,00,000 

Location
- Bengaluru
"

Followers: "Deepika Joshi, Anup Kalbalia, Smruti Shirodkar, Smruti Shirodkar, Neha Kakkoth"
Description:
"About the role
As a Content writer, you will be expected to create dynamic and engaging content across our channels. The ideal candidate will be comfortable writing both long and short form content for CodeChef’s different channels and requirements. Tasks will range from creating social media posts and planning ad campaigns to writing and editing blog posts and reviewing all written communication. CodeChef offers plenty of opportunities to learn the ins and outs of a world-famous competitive programming platform as well as the chance to be part of exciting events.

Responsibilities
- Write creative content for marketing campaigns for CodeChef and its initiatives
- Be responsible for proofreading, suggesting changes and editing all content on the CodeChef website
- Manage CodeChef’s presence on social media platforms: Facebook, Twitter, Quora, etc
- Write engaging and relevant content on the CodeChef blog
- Draft email communications for our customer/client support process as and when necessary
- Assist in the creation of speeches and presentations as and when necessary
- Contribute to the digital marketing processes, especially content strategy
- Public Relations outreach
- Draft scripts for video advertisements, testimonials and other miscellaneous marketing materials

What should you possess
- Solid command over the English language 
- Love for writing and using it as a weapon of choice to express
- Ability to present thoughts into writing in a succinct way and possess an ability to create compelling content in limited time
- Passion for journalism, research, and reporting
- Creativity, enthusiasm and quick thinking
- Ability to create content with various tones
- Ability to manage deadlines and juggle multiple tasks

Good to have
- Great organizational and learning skills
- Mastery of editing tools like Word and Google Docs. Familiarity with keyword placement and other SEO best practices
- An understanding of formatting articles on the web and knowledge of basic HTML
- Some experience with online marketing and lead generation

Experience
- 2 - 5 years 

Annual Salary Range 
- Rs. 4,00,000 - 7,00,000




"

"About the role
CodeChef is seeking a content writing enthusiast for a frenetic journey, you will be​ involved with brainstorming and tweaking content, playing a critical role in content ideation, curation and strategy across various channels. 

Internship Duration 
-In-office full-time internship for 3 months, Full-Time conversion based on internship performance 
-We are also open to virtual internship engagements

Responsibilities
1. Brainstorm and ideate write-ups for our Blog  and website and suggest changes in existing content 
2. Create branded content such as advertisements across various online and offline channels 
3. Planning and drafting content for marketing campaigns on  Social Media (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) 
4. Proofing reading and editing content on a day to day basis 
5. Excellent project and time management skills and must be good at handling time-sensitive projects and adhering to deadlines

What should you possess
1. Should have very strong writing and communication skills along with attention to detail 
2. Should be a highly motivated and energetic team player, with excellent interpersonal skills and can-do attitude 
3.. Should have an ability to complete large volumes of work quickly and independently with a high level of drive, initiative, and self-motivation 
4. Should have an ability to manage time effectively, set priorities and meet deadlines 
5. Should be logical and a problem solver 

Monthly Stipend 
- Rs. 15,000
"

Description:
"About the role
CodeChef is seeking an engineer for a frenetic journey, who will be​ involved in all technical/engineering aspects related to the platform, playing a critical role in the design, planning, development, and deployment. She will help develop best practices for future development. The job offers the rare delight of owning the platform which is an integral part of the programming community.

Responsibilities
- Code, develop, design and architect features related to the existing application(s). We expect you to own modules end to end and take pride in the features/changes you ship.
- Deliver across the entire app life cycle, design, build, deploy, test and support.
- Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
- Bug fixing, thwarting hackers.
- Optimizations, scaling, performance enhancements.
- Mentoring interns and new team members.
- Investigation of hard algorithmic problems (occasionally)

What should you possess
- 2+ years of experience at cutting edge organization(s) or startup(s).
- Good algorithmic problem-solving skills.
- In-depth knowledge of any one programming language.
- Exposure to any web technology. (PHP/Python/Ruby/Erlang etc)
- Academic/Industrial exposure to Computer Science. (Not having a professional computer science degree should not deter you from knowing the fundamentals)
- Understanding of Networking, Operating Systems, Databases.
- Insight into the inner workings of the Web. Hands-on with REST APIs / APIs, Proxies, HTTP, DNS,  Queuing & Scheduling. 
- Experience in using *nix systems like GNU/Linux & Mac OS X. 
- Curiosity to work with front-end (JS HTML & CSS) and appreciation for aesthetics. (We take pride in our software only if people can use it)
- If you are a Free and Open Source Software contributor, do let us know. We value it.

Experience
- 2 - 5 years 

Annual Salary Range
- Rs. 10,00,000 - Rs. 18,00,000 

Location
- Mumbai
"

Followers: "Deepika Joshi, Catherine Solomon, Anup Kalbalia, Kelly Pinto"
Description:
"About the role
As a UI developer, you’ll be a part of the development team and a co-owner of CodeChef’s front-end. You’ll be expected to create, maintain and improve components of the website, both of the user-facing and in-house modules. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.

Responsibilities
- Convert the design into bug-free, clean functional screens using HTML/CSS & JS (along with any JS framework), with utmost care for aesthetics and responsiveness. We expect you to own modules end to end and take pride in the changes and UI that you ship
- Establishing a framework by taking care of reusability of the components you write
- Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
- Optimizing, cleaning, rewriting existing code
- Optimizing page speeds and performance

What should you possess
- Ability to solve problems and implement the same in your workflow
- Ability to multi-task to manage workload with prioritization of tasks
- Consistency in deliverables with minimum supervision

Must have
- Pixel Perfect conversion of design into code
- Building Responsive UI
- HTML5
- CSS3
- SASS
- Some JS framework
- Knowledge of a VCS
- Browser testing and debugging
- Knowledge of Adobe Illustrator

Good to have
- Knowledge of vanilla JavaScript
- Knowledge of ES6, OOJS, AJAX, JSON with REST APIs, NPM + Gulp
- Ability to produce semantic markup with BEM (Block element modifier) nomenclature
- Knowledge of making an application A11y friendly
- Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks like Ember.js, Vue.js, React.js or Angular (any)
- Understanding of graceful degradation and progressive enhancement
- Understanding of layout aesthetics and familiarity with Adobe suite and Sketch

Experience
- Fresher

Annual Salary Range
- Rs. 3,00,000 - Rs. 4,00,000
"

"About Flock
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. Role Overview
The marketing team is seeking a performance marketing leader that has a passion for “moving the needle” by implementing campaigns that add concrete value to our revenue generation efforts. This role has both a large influence on our company’s revenue creation and ample room for career development. This role will require a tremendous amount of independence and ability to make strategic decisions. It is a fast-paced and data-intensive position within the marketing team.

ListContent1:
"
  • Employ the 70/20/10 rule to campaign management: invest 70% in established programs, 20% to new programs that are starting to gain traction, and 10% to new ideas that are completely untested
  • Own end-to-end management of global program execution, including: campaign setup, A/B testing, conversion flows, and campaign optimization to maximize team creations for all performance channels (ppc, influencer, affiliate, OOHA, & referral)
  • Work with our creative and content teams to develop best practices for our performance channels
  • Define growth and performance benchmarks and establish analytics and reporting for these KPIs
  • Ongoing sourcing, hiring and management of key performance marketing hires
  • Partner with lifecycle marketing to improve campaign performance by segmenting messaging to align with the various touch points along the customer’s journey
"
ListTitle2: Who are we looking for?
ListContent2:
• Analytical – love to geek out over pivot tables and diving into spreadsheets of data to understand what drives performance
  • Creative – you know marketing programs are equal parts data analytics and good creative design. Can tap into both their right and left brain to come up with creative solutions.
  • Organized and Detail-Oriented – Obsessively makes to-do lists and can’t stand to let things fall through the cracks.
  • Experienced – This isn't your first time to the rodeo. You have a few years of experience developing and managing complex B2C marketing campaigns. This team is expected to grow substantially over the next 2 years.
ListTitle3: Who can apply for this role?
ListContent3:
"
  • 8+ years experience in either B2C (transactional: ecomm, gaming, etc), or high-volume/high velocity B2B and a portfolio of running successful performance marketing campaigns
  • An ability to prioritize what’s most important, including proactively taking on new challenges that might not have been in the original plan
  • Proficient to advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel (pivot tables,VLOOKUP, & IF functions) & SQL
  • You know your way around: Ads Manager, AdWords, WordPress, Google Analytics, & Hubspot
  • A disdain for the status quo; able to think and act outside the confines of the job description, desire to contribute value in other areas of growth 
"

"
  • Curate and contribute to the development of highly-creative on-brand content (email, blog, infographics, eBooks, whitepapers, webinars, videos, etc.) necessary to support inbound lead gen efforts
  • Deeply understand the market by speaking with customers, partners, and influencers as well as industry experts

  • Conducting ongoing usability tests to gauge content effectiveness. Gathering data and handle analytics and make recommendations based on those results
  • Leveraging market data to develop thought leadership content themes/topics and execute a plan to develop the assets that support a point of view and educate customers that leads to critical behavioral metrics
  • Act as a brand steward and interpret the content strategy across all channels including multiple newsletters, website, social, podcasting and video
  • Develop and maintain the infrastructure to produce thoughtful co-marketing that engages our target audience through partners and other third-party brands

"
ListTitle2: Who can apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 6+ years of content marketing experience within an organization where content was responsible for a significant portion of revenue creation
  • 2+ years of experience managing a high performing team of content marketers
  • A first principles thinker. You’ve built or been part of an organization that has implemented a world-class content marketing team that others try to emulate and have challenge accepted best practices(you know what a pillar page is and you know how to move a piece of content from the third page to the first page on Google)
  • You’re a master storyteller, folks say you have immaculate written and oral communication skills
  • You are passionate about building teams and mentoring individuals You have expertise with managing external resources
"

ListContent1:
"
  • The marketing team at Flock is seeking a self-serve marketing leader. Have you held roles in more than one functional area of marketing? Have you worked closely with product teams before? Do you crave a high volume/high velocity sales model?
  • The Self-Serve Marketing Lead will be a unique combination of growth marketing and extending through product marketing for team activation, expansion and monetization. This individual will not be focused on driving top of funnel awareness for Flock, but instead sit lower in the marketing funnel and focus on driving revenue from freemium teams; owning the freemium to premium marketing motion.
  • This is an entrepreneurial leadership role, with an opportunity to develop and expand the team. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment where you are responsible for owning revenue and the consumer journey for hundreds of thousands of Flock’s self-serve customers globally and meeting ambitious growth targets that fuel our success, this is the position for you! 
"
ListTitle2: What is the job like?
ListContent2:
"
  • You’ll recruit, mentor & develop a team of cross-functional marketers (email to copywriters) in order to drive actions across the customer lifecycle, spanning onboarding, engagement, monetization, and cross-sell opps
  • Work with: 
  • The performance marketing and content teams to optimize marketing activities that acquire teams teams who will ultimately end up being successful long term users of Flock
  • The product team to improve the global activation rate of our pro plan by removing friction and improving the user experience from team create to monetization.
  • The larger marketing team to identify areas of growth across our free user database
  • You will develop the content and contact strategy based on user signals, data, and customer needs, and leverage infrastructure that you help create to accelerate us to that goal.
  • For example, personalized lifecycle emails, push notifications and in app communications may work well. But what else can we bring to the table?
  • Define and build a customer segmentation strategy to deliver personalized marketing programs that creates an 'always-on' approach by looking at our customer's entire journey from their first interaction with Floc’s products through the rest of their lives as Flock users, and then draft and optimize messaging to align with the various touch points along that journey
"
ListContent3:
"
  • Experienced – A sophisticated understanding of subscription, consumer or a freemium business model; with a consistent record of building new capabilities in a high volume/high velocity environment
  • Analytical – love to geek out over pivot tables and diving into spreadsheets of data to understand what drives performance
  • A master storyteller – You can craft a compelling narrative across different channels - you know how to match the message to the medium
  • Gritty –  You never hesitate to roll up your sleeves and tackle something hands-on, you persevere when others fall away
"
ListTitle4: Who can apply for this role?
ListContent4:
"
  • 6+ years experience in either B2C (transactional: ecomm, gaming, etc), or high-volume/high velocity B2B and a portfolio of running successful monetization campaigns
  • At least 2 years of experience leading teams with a demonstrated ability to attract, develop, and retain top talent
  • Extensive expertise in automation, nurturing, and/or email marketing. Can you talk about campaigns you've run that turn people from leads/users into PQLs or customers? Are you an expert at moving people to the next stage in a buying or on-boarding process?
  • Ability to collaborate with and motivate individuals across the organization with different skills and mindsets as well as work with remote teams
  • Solid copywriting experience
  • Strong experience in user engagement, loyalty, lifecycle and ecommerce conversion via CRM [email, push]
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Ensuring a student led ecosystem, where computational skills can be developed by effective sharing of knowledge and resources. Your role will be to enable creation and maintenance of such learning structures in the colleges.
  • Ensure smooth functioning of College Campus Chapters.
  • Plan and coordinate the workshop schedules with the Colleges.
  • Engage and coordinate with the CodeChef Campus Representatives. (College Students)
  • Engage in effective communication with various stakeholders for the program to provide support and resolve queries (Emails and Calls).
"
ListTitle2: Who should Apply for this role
ListContent2:
• 0 - 2 years experience (Freshers awaiting results can apply.)
  • Handle daily operations to manage the project.
  • Proficiency in written and verbal communication. (English)
  • To research and analyze current trends to help decision making.
  • Ability to troubleshoot queries and concerns in a timely manner to minimize escalation.

Posting Title: House Assistant for CEO’s Executive Office
ListContent1:
"
  • Manage and supervise the household team of housekeepers, chefs, drivers, butlers all across the residences (India, UK, UAE)
  • Oversees food service standards and housekeeping procedures for the executive household.
  • Report and coordinate with vendors to resolve maintenance, security issues to the Executive household office.
  • Assists with maintaining the household budgets, petty cash and inventory supplies.
  • Preparation and implementation of Standard SOP’s across residences for any new processes adopted for the executive residences.     
  • Manage payments of utilities across the residences and coordinate for shifts with executive household team and their needs for their respective locations.
  • Ensure coordination and seamless experiences for guests / client visits and organize get togethers / parties. 
  • Cross departmental coordination on travel schedules and guest stay schedule management.
  • Work closely with Head chefs to ensure fulfillment of dietary requirements of health chart.
  • Assists with planning and organizing parties and events in the home.   
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 3 Years Diploma or Bachelor’s Degree in hotel Management specialized in F&B Service. Proficiency in working with MS office are an added advantage.
  • 2 to 5 years’ experience in managing Residence / Estate management, Hotels, Restaurants, F&B Service. Basic knowledge of Housekeeping.
  • Understands social etiquette.
  • Totally discreet, trustworthy and loyal.
  • Skillful at dealing with all classes of people.
  • Flexibility to respond to a variety of different work situations and ability to work on his own.
  • Immaculately presented and well-mannered.
  • Positive attitude and good communication skills, with excellent grooming standards.
  • A good organiser with excellent attention to detail.
  • Calm, flexible and able to multitask.
  • Able to anticipate CEO’s and his guest needs.
  • Someone who adheres to consistently high standards.
  • Commitment to delivering a high level of service equivalent to that of 5 star hotels.
  • Polite and friendly, even after a long day.
  • Non-smoker, non-alcoholic.
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Lead and manage a team of Executive Assistants.
  • Manage travel arrangements for the CEO (including but not limited to visa arrangements, ticket bookings, cab arrangements, hotel bookings etc.)
  • Coordinate and maintain the calendar including organizing all appointments, meetings, conferences all across the world etc.    
  • Follow-ups and Follow-throughs with internal teams.
  • Managing phone calls, routine emails and correspondence with vendors and clients within India and Internationally.
  • Maintain strong follow-up systems for timely completion of projects/assignments and keeping the CEO updated on any developments, status reports related to ongoing projects.
  • Work on ad hoc research projects and ensure timely completion with 100% accuracy and eye for detailing.
  • Managing personal tasks including managing petty cash and coordination with Executive household team.
  • Should be high on integrity and able to maintain confidentiality in day to day operations.
  • Open to travel internationally and work in flexible shifts - India and UK shifts (on rotation basis).
  • Organizing and servicing Meetings, social gatherings and events. Remain up-to-date with the latest trends and events in the industry.
  • Should have a Go Getter attitude and must be a team player ;)
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 4+ years of work experience preferably in Executive Assistant / Secretarial activities.
  • Team Management experience would be preferred.
  • Strong conceptual thinker with strong analytical skills.
  • Immaculate written and oral communication skills with the ability to take ownership of one's work.
  • Process oriented: Demonstrable commitment to following processes, documentation etc.
  • Proficient at using the Internet, and demonstrable technical aptitude / inclination.
  • Intelligent with good logical reasoning.
  • Proactive with a Go-getter attitude.
  • Prior experience working with successful entrepreneur(s) preferred.
"

We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal. If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!

ListContent1:
"
  • Analytics
  • Become the centre of knowledge for the entire marketing org
  • Collaborate with Data Science org to spec and build dashboards
  • Enable full-funnel tracking for all leads and their respective activities
  • Deliver insights and ‘aha’ moments to the Marketing org and Executive Leaders and become the launchpad for all new decision making and initiatives

  • Technology:
  • Identify and lead implementation of new marketing technology needs that will enable the team to be less dependent on limited internally built tools (eg AppCues or Optimizely)
  • Increase and maintain our synchronization between HubSpot and actual Flock product usage for better utilization and segmentation of various monetization efforts
  • Manage existing marketing tech stack including and potentially a newly built CMS
  • Implement initiatives that will lead sales to better product usage of HubSpot such as lead scoring in order to enable them to prioritize high value customers and reduce lead to attack time
 
  • Demand Generation:
  • Ensure alignment and proper SLA handoff between sales and marketing
  • Segment and leverage the marketing database for greater campaign efficiency and effectiveness
  • Work with internal and external designers to create forms and landing pages to support acquisition and conversion loops
 
  • Marketing Budget Management:
  • Own marketing budget management, tracking, and reporting of marketing activities to ensure ROI and continued investment
"
ListTitle2: Who are we looking for?
ListContent2:
• Thought-leader – Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement
  • Experienced – This isn't your first time to the rodeo. You have a few years in B2B SaaS marketing and have set up an optimized a modern martech stack in support of a B2B GTM strategy
  • Analytical – You can translate complex data sets to concrete business recommendations for marketing and sales leadership with the goal to optimize revenue generating investments
  • Organized and Detail-Oriented – You obsessively make to-do lists and can’t stand to let things fall through the cracks
ListTitle3: Who can apply for this role?
ListContent3:
"
  • Minimum 3-5 years’ experience in a Marketing/Sales Operations role or similar position
  • Extensive experience in dashboarding, analytics and running data science/predictive models. Knowledge of Python/R is highly desirable
  • Advanced knowledge of Google Analytics/HubSpot/Salesforce and Excel
  • Working knowledge of SQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript preferred
  • Demonstrated ability to excel in a fast-paced environment
  • Bachelor's Degree
  • Bonus Points: Strong knowledge of high velocity/high volume GTM strategy. 

McKinsey article on the importance of the role: https://www.mckinsey.com/business-functions/marketing-and-sales/our-insights/how-digital-marketing-operations-can-transform-business
"

Role Overview
The Manager of Lifecycle Marketing will be responsible for driving key customer actions across the customer journey. This will be achieved by developing roadmaps based on customer insights and ensuring prioritization based on impact, executing across multiple channels.
 
The successful candidate is a seasoned marketer with experience in all aspects of customer lifecycle management including building cross channel initiatives, personalized trigger campaigns, and proper customer segmentation. Candidates will have experience working cross-functionally across internal and external teams, and driving programs that reach millions of users, as well as an aptitude for strong copywriting. A mind for innovation, putting the customer first, and learning through testing is also highly valued.
"

ListContent1:

  • Drive the vision, strategy and copy around our lifecycle efforts specifically for email/CRM, in-app messaging (using tools like AppCues or WalkMe), and working withour performance marketing team to ensure alignment with our PPC campaigns

ListTitle2: Who can apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • 4+ years of experience in B2C or high volume/high velocity marketing, specifically CRM email marketing or onboarding marketing or lifecycle marketing, using marketing automation tools (HubSpot a plus)
  • Experience in the end-to-end design, development and management of lifecycle marketing programs and strategies
  • Have a knack for placing themselves in the shoes of the customers and building
  • customer insights that can lead to a solid understanding of customer journeys
  • Track record of driving cultural change and influencing organizations through communications.
  • Exceptional writing skills, with the ability to formulate a clear point of view with concise communication
  • An agile, flexible individual with a “can-do,” problem-solving approach to managing ambiguity.
  • A curious self-starter with a proven track record of diving into unknown territory and learning new concepts.
"

Followers: "Nupur Chakravorty, Poppin Mathias, Anup Kalbalia, Prerna Gera, Kelly Pinto"
Description:
"About the role
CodeChef is seeking an engineer for a frenetic journey, who will be​ involved in all technical/engineering aspects related to the platform, playing a critical role in the design, planning, development, and deployment. She will help develop best practices for future development. The job offers the rare delight of owning the platform which is an integral part of the programming community.

Responsibilities
- Code, develop, design and architect features related to the existing application(s). We expect you to own modules end to end and take pride in the features/changes you ship.
- Deliver across the entire app life cycle, design, build, deploy, test and support.
- Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
- Bug fixing, thwarting hackers.
- Optimizations, scaling, performance enhancements.
- Mentoring interns and new team members.
- Investigation of hard algorithmic problems (occasionally)

What should you possess
- 2+ years of experience at cutting edge organization(s) or startup(s).
- Good algorithmic problem-solving skills.
- In-depth knowledge of any one programming language.
- Exposure to any web technology. (PHP/Python/Ruby/Erlang etc)
- Academic/Industrial exposure to Computer Science. (Not having a professional computer science degree should not deter you from knowing the fundamentals)
- Understanding of Networking, Operating Systems, Databases.
- Insight into the inner workings of the Web. Hands-on with REST APIs / APIs, Proxies, HTTP, DNS,  Queuing & Scheduling. 
- Experience in using *nix systems like GNU/Linux & Mac OS X. 
- Curiosity to work with front-end (JS HTML & CSS) and appreciation for aesthetics. (We take pride in our software only if people can use it)
- If you are a Free and Open Source Software contributor, do let us know. We value it.

Experience
- 2 - 5 years 

Annual Salary Range
- Rs. 10,00,000 - Rs. 18,00,000 

Location
- Mumbai
"

ListContent1:
"
  • As a Talent Scout you will work with a global team to identify and onboard ""A"" players for our expanding team in Boston.
  • You will devise and execute creative recruitment strategies for continuing this growth pace while maintaining our high standards of quality.
  • You will be responsible for the entire life-cycle of sales, marketing and customer success recruitment at Flock, including strategy, sourcing, short-listing, pitching, communication, coordination, scheduling and negotiation.
  • You will be required to execute myriad sourcing strategies conventional and unconventional, online and offline, and will have the creative license to adopt any approach as long as it is within the confines of our value system.
  • You will be our brand ambassador and evangelize Flock to potential candidates who are game changers in their area of work.
  • Coordinate with respective functional heads to define recruitment requirements, job specifications, interview processes, prepare budgets and plans.
  • Develop proactive sourcing strategies to engage and nurture a pipeline of passive talent
  • Define and implement creative sourcing strategies to source 'A' players from colleges, workplaces, databases
  • Define and implement creative marketing strategies and campaigns to attract top talent from the industry.
  • Define and implement sourcing, pitching and recruitment processes.
  • Ensure our candidates have a world class interviewing and onboarding experience.
  • Ideate and create relevant material for marketing Flock and our businesses to potential candidates
  • Maximize ROI on recruitment costs and increase recruitment efficiencies.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • You should have 4- 6 years of experience in recruitment.
  • You have exceptional communication skills - written and spoken
  • Considerable experience with myriad sourcing strategies including portals, ads, consultants, social networking, conferences, headhunting etc
  • Demonstrable creativity with respect to sourcing candidates
  • Experience in sourcing, pitching and recruiting for mid management and senior management positions
  • Well versed with technology and associated jargon.
  • Ability to discuss technology to a limited extent as required by the profile.
  • Ability to grasp and deliver an excellent pitch to potential candidates
  • Keen sense of searching for and identifying exceptionally talented candidates
  • Experience with using new age media such as social network, linkedin, blogs etc
  • Experience in defining and implementing online marketing campaigns through social media, search marketing etc
  • Process oriented: Demonstrable commitment to defining, documenting and following processes and workflows.
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Manage IT procurement and billing process for the different business units.
  • Negotiating with vendors for quotes and comparing them.
  • Preparing Purchase order, tracking them and completing the payment process.
  • Order fulfillment tracking & Payment release process 
  • Sourcing and identification of prospective vendors 
  • Preparation of competitive statements of vendors proposals 
"

  • Understanding AMC of IT Products 
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Design and develop data driven analysis and recommend business and product insights.
  • Inspire self-serve data use by building dashboards and reports to drive awareness and understanding of metrics.
  • Understand the business case behind each effort and can clearly articulate the value to partners across the business.
  • Working on tools like (you will receive training on the ones you haven’t already used) – Kibana + Elastic search, Hive and Hadoop, SQL queries, Microsoft excel, Google Analytics, Amazon Quicksight, Python, Mobile app tracking tools and other internal tools.
  • Setting up and maintaining automated recurring reports that would help the business teams in their respective jobs.
  • Creating regular Business Intelligence reports by querying these databases/tools and organizing the data into easy to understand reports.
  • Creating and managing data analytics dashboards using data visualisation tools.  You would need to understand the product and the business to create dashboards that would help the respective teams (product, marketing, sales, support, etc).
  • Analyse the data sets and dashboards to identify the patterns and trends. Share the business intelligence and market intelligence with the business teams regularly via reports or presentation sessions.
  • Defining the data collection process i.e. working alongside the product and business teams to establish their needs and converting them into data collection requirements.
  • Secondary market research using web resources.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • You have an academic background in engineering and statistics – preferably a degree / diploma / course in both.
  • You have some knowledge on generating business intelligence reports using SQL queries or BI tools and have used at least some analytics tool regularly eg mixpanel, Google analytics, MAT, flurry or some analytics tool.
  • 3+ yrs experience in running complex SQL queries, preparing reports in excel or any other advanced data visualization tool, data analysis, business intelligence and storyboarding.
  • Advanced Excel proficiency including Pivot tables, vlookup / hlookup, graphs etc.
  • Experience working on Marketing & Sales/Product analytics with/for a B2B Saas company is a plusStrong business acumen.
  • Familiar with the concepts and reports for funnels, cohorts, retention, etc.
  • Analytical mindset
  • Knowledge of excel macros would be a plus but is not mandatory
  • Good verbal and written communication skills
"

Description:
"About Flock
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.
 
With 30,000 businesses already using the platform we know that we are onto something big, and are now gearing up for a period of rapid growth.

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Resellerclub, Logicboxes and BigRock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.

Role Overview

This is an exciting early stage sales role (although we have over 30,000 businesses signed up and we’re growing fast, we only started our monetization journey less than a year ago!). You will help us build and lead our rapidly growing inside sales team within the calendar year. 
To start with, in addition to carrying an individual quota, you will be helping to design the systems and processes required for you to scale the mid-market team.  You will have lots of support with an Ops and Marketing team already in place; but at the same time you will have the space to make real mark on the shape of the organization. 
"

Benefits and Perks
We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth.

And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our workspaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!

We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal. If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Lead, hire, and build. You are a coach who’ll start by taking over some subset of current four hunters and help attract, interview, train, and mentor our next dozen superstars.
  • Motivate.  Your team to call, call, call, and get better and faster at closing business professionals over the phone across the globe.
  • Invent.  We have product-market fit and initial traction but we need a sales leader who can sell the product we have, distill why customers are buying, and scale up the success we are having.
  • Coach. You help your junior hunters become senior, and your senior hunters become even better at their craft.
  • Collaborate. You have our marketing department to help with targeting and lead gen, and our support team for killer support.  
  • Perform. Exceed booking and revenue quota targets.
  • Forecast. Accurately forecast monthly, quarterly and annual bookings numbers.
"
ListTitle2: You:
ListContent2:
"
  • Love people. You’ve hired, managed, and grown SaaS salespeople who are professional, personable, and great closers.
  • Are numbers-driven. You get that sales is a machine. You’ve got your favorite ways to measure results and Excel is your friend.
  • Are a success. People have worked for you more than once and want to work for you again.
  • Are technologically savvy. CRM and Salesforce automation tools are child’s play to you.
  • Are nice. You play well with others – and command credibility, too.
  • Are a born deal maker.  You understand that your job is to help get deals done that work for all parties.  
  • Have 3+ years of experience building and managing high-performing SaaS sales teams.
  • Have 7+ years of experience being an SaaS sale professional yourself.
  • Understand and have experience selling to C-level, VPs, IT, and Procurement.
"

Description:
"About Flock

Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.

Role Overview
 
The Social Media Marketing Manager role will be responsible for leading key social marketing initiatives from strategy through execution. You will utilize your knowledge and understanding of social media to build a presence from the ground up, and build a positive community engagement through various social media channels. You will deliver best-in-class content to our audiences and ensure social KPIs are met alongside business objectives. 
 
We are looking for an entrepreneurial marketer who likes to roll up your sleeves and get things done. You understand the importance of measuring outcomes and ROI but you lead with your creative side. You should be fully immersed in social media trends and platforms and understand both what drives consumer engagement and platform algorithms. Candidates will have experience working cross-functionally across internal and external teams, and driving programs that reach millions of users, as well as an aptitude for strong copy-writing. A mind for innovation, putting the customer first, and learning through testing is also highly valued.


"

Description:
"Role Overview
This is an exciting early stage Customer Success role (although we have over 30,000 businesses signed up and we’re growing fast, we only started our monetization journey less than a year ago!). You will maximize Adoption and Client Retention while influencing increased subscription revenue. In this role you will act as a strategic advisor to your clients to ensure they maximize the value of their investment with Flock’s SaaS portfolio.

You will work towards helping drive renewal of your customer’s Flock subscriptions and work closely with the account team to enable further adoption of Flock products within your assigned territory.

  • Own end-to-end execution, measurement, reporting and optimization of global paid search campaigns for Flock

  • Writing own Search Ad Copy and working with teams to build and optimize landing pages

  • Running A/B tests across paid search campaigns & landing pages

  • Ability to plan, design, and execute paid social (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn)campaigns from execution to completion will be beneficial

"

Role
Flock is looking for a Director of Marketing to drive growth for our newly launched mail product, Flock Mail. As Director of Marketing you'll be uniquely positioned to drive growth for Mail to our first set of business users. We need a true problem solver for this role and someone who enjoys taking products from zero to one. This role will report to the VP of Global Marketing. You will lead and hire a small team of marketers while building out the direct to business/self-serve motion for Mail. This individual should have experience launching products, building high performing teams, and working in a high-volume/transactional sales model. This is an entrepreneurial leadership role, with an opportunity to develop and expand the team. You will have a ton of visibility across the org. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment where you are responsible for owning a number and meeting ambitious growth targets that fuel our success, this is the position for you! 
"

Benefits and Perks
We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth.

And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer relocation benefits. Our work spaces are welcoming and fun. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!

We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal. If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Define and drive our TOFU demand generation strategy to exponentially scale relevant traffic and signups for Flock Mail.
  • Start to build out a strong sub-brand with our internal brand teams for Flock Mail 
  • Drive Flock Mail’s content strategy at the top of funnel leading to creation of a comprehensive range of content types, including blog posts, downloadable guides, differentiated use cases, videos, case studies, white papers, content for email campaigns, product launch content, customer stories, webinars and more.
  • Work with our internal performance marketing teams to drive signups for Flock Mail via various PPC channels
  • Lead the Flock Mail team in annual and quarterly planning, keeping track of budget, and reporting on marketing initiatives’ performance, with a focus on ROI & user growth. 
  • Work closely with multifunctional teams such as sales, product, engineering and operations teams to drive the overall product growth vision
  • Support the BD function within Flock Mail to sign-up new registrar and hosting companies as resellers of the product

"
ListTitle2: You will succeed in this role if you are:
ListContent2:
• A good storyteller
  • A hustler
  • Naturally curious 
  • Candid
  • Adaptable
ListContent3:
"
  • 7+ years of experience in leading & managing marketing teams at high growth organizations (preferably in the B2B SaaS space or B2C).
  • Have worked closely with product teams 
  • Have spent time in two or more different functional areas within marketing (product marketing, content, performance, brand, etc)
  • Track record of user growth through organic acquisition channels including, SEO, email marketing, social media, and more
  • Experience in defining and optimizing drip campaigns and customer touch points.
  • Demonstrated ability to have recruited, mentored and grown a world-class marketing team.
  • Experience in marketing beyond North America will be an added bonus.
  • Immaculate written and verbal communication skills, excellent business acumen, and a penchant for marketing internet products.
"

Followers: "Poppin Mathias, Ninad Raval, Shwetha Quinita Dsouza, Nishant Das"
Description:
"About Flock

Flock started with an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. We believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.

With 30,000 businesses already using the platform we know that we are onto something big, and are now gearing up for a period of rapid growth.

With a vision to empower every individual in the world to leverage their full potential and maximize their impact, Flock is now transforming into a business suite of products - adding business mail, calendar and contacts to its repertoire. Flock’s mail offering is an easy-to-use slick and clean email with incredibly powerful features tailor made for its users.

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Resellerclub, Logicboxes and BigRock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.

As an Associate Product Manager (APM), you will help strategize and design our products, manage the end-to-end execution of product features, and contribute to product vision and strategy.
"

"About Flock

He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.

Role Overview

This is an exciting early stage sales role (although we have over 30,000 businesses signed up and we’re growing fast, we only started our monetization journey less than a year ago!). You will help us build and lead our rapidly growing inside sales team within the calendar year. 
To start with, in addition to carrying an individual quota, you will be helping to design the systems and processes required for you to scale the mid-market team.  You will have lots of support with an Ops and Marketing team already in place; but at the same time you will have the space to make real mark on the shape of the organization. 
"

ListContent1:
"
  • Lead, hire, and build. You are a coach who’ll start by learning the systems and processes that have made us successful from our international team and replicating that in the US. Then help attract, interview, train, and mentor future superstars to build out our North America Inside Sales office in Boston.
  • Motivate.  Your team to call, call, call, and get better and faster at closing business professionals over the phone across the globe.
  • Invent.  We have product-market fit and initial traction but we need a sales leader who can sell the product we have, distill why customers are buying, and scale up the success we are having.
  • Coach. You help your junior hunters become senior, and your senior hunters become even better at their craft.
  • Collaborate. You have our marketing department to help with targeting and lead gen, and our support team for killer support.  
  • Perform. Exceed booking and revenue quota targets.
  • Forecast. Accurately forecast monthly, quarterly and annual bookings numbers.
"
ListTitle2: You:
ListContent2:
"
  • Love people. You’ve hired, managed, and grown SaaS salespeople who are professional, personable, and great closers.
  • Are numbers-driven. You get that sales is a machine. You’ve got your favorite ways to measure results and Excel is your friend.
  • Are a success. People have worked for you more than once and want to work for you again.
  • Are technologically savvy. CRM and Sales force automation tools are child’s play to you.
  • Are nice. You play well with others – and command credibility, too.
  • Are a born deal maker.  You understand that your job is to help get deals done that work for all parties.  
  • Have 3+ years of experience building and managing high-performing SaaS sales teams.
  • Have 7+ years of experience being an SaaS sale professional yourself.
  • Understand and have experience selling to C-level, VPs, IT, and Procurement.
"

Description:
"About the role
CodeChef is seeking a marketing enthusiast for a frenetic journey, who will be​ involved with brainstorming and tweaking online and offline campaigns, playing a critical role in campaign management, along with content and strategy ideation.  We are looking for someone who will help us increase our target audience reach. 

Internship Duration 
-In-office full-time internship for 3 months

Responsibilities
1. Planning and initiating online marketing campaigns on  Social Media (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) and via Email      effectively to reach target audiences
2.  Attend networking events and conferences to build awareness about CodeChef
3. Brainstorm and ideate online and offline marketing campaigns effectively to reach target audiences 
4. Monitor and focus on user retention/engagement on various channels 
5. Manage the brand across various online and offline channels 
6. Excellent project and time management skills and must be good at handling time-sensitive projects and adhering to deadlines

What should you possess
1. Should have very strong writing and communication skills along with attention to detail 
2. Should be a highly motivated and energetic team player, with excellent interpersonal skills and can-do attitude 
3.. Should have an ability to complete large volumes of work quickly and independently with a high level of drive, initiative, and self-motivation 
4. Should have an ability to manage time effectively, set priorities and meet deadlines ○ Should be logical and a problem solver 

Monthly Stipend 
- Rs. 15,000 to Rs. 18,000
"

As our in house SEO expert, you will work to enable the Flock’s success by helping grow and optimize our web presence, and that of our products and content. ListContent1:
"
  • You will devise tactical and strategic initiatives to help Flock rank in the first three results for our core in-market keywords across desktop and mobile websites
  • Audit our domains and web presence to keep our websites error free and SEO best-practice compliant
  • Achieve web traffic growth that is attributable to improvements in technical SEO
  • Optimize and improve technical SEO for Flock across owned web properties for better discoverability and organic search reach
  • Recommend to the web development team, content team, and performance marketing team high impact keyword opps 
  • Participate in the redesign of Flock.com as we move towards a multi-product web presence, and make recommendations as we operationalize the change
  • Optimize SEO to support diverse clients from high powered desktop computers to small footprint mobile devices
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • You have extensive experience (5+ years) in front-end technologies in marketing tech (experience in SaaS/e-commerce is a bonus!)
  • You’ve managed technical SEO for a company with 1 million+ monthly visitors, and have made an impact in your current or previous roles
  • You have extensive experience in SEO and marketing tech - including Google Search Console, Google Analytics
  • Have deep experience optimizing at-least one top-tier CMS (experience with Wordpress and Hubspot is highly desirable)
  • You have a working knowledge of web-technologies including HTML5, Javascript and CSS
  • You know how to move a page that’s ranking on page 3 of the SERP to page 1
  • You know what a ‘Featured Snippet’ on Google is, and you know how to get your website to start showing up in them
  • You’re a pro at technical SEO implementation and have demonstrated your impact through boosting website traffic and organic search traffic metrics
  • You have an experimental mindset and are not afraid to try new things
"

ListContent1:

  • Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers.

  • Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges.
  • Integration of data storage solutions like MySQL, MongoDB.
  • Build automation softwares and background services to handle huge datasets.
  • Integrating APIs from vendors.
  • Creating RESTful APIs.
"

  • Analytical mindset.
  • Python & NodeJS knowledge is bonus.
  • Good verbal and written communication skills.
  • High Level of sincerity and accountability.
"

  • Have an ability to monitor, track, and report on engagement, to tweak and optimize existing content and use the data to guide new content creation. 
"

Description:
"About the role
CodeChef is looking out for an Experienced Graphic Designer who actively takes part in improving and changing aesthetics of CodeChef’s internal and external collateral. The work will have a direct impact on grabbing attention and communicating the right message to our users. 
 
Responsibilities
 - Designing imagery for website, newsletters, social media channels, contests and the mobile interface.
- Designing Collaterals like T-Shirts, mugs, caps, pens, etc.
- Designing Brochures, Diaries, PR material, magazine ads, exhibition Display.
- Brainstorming and ideating in making creative designs for various marketing campaigns
- Translating written ad briefs or wire-frames into finished ads, ready to be uploaded to ad networks
- Fulfilling several requests simultaneously while meeting deadlines
- Dealing with production and printing vendors
 
What should you possess:
 - Preferably 2+ years' experience as a Graphics Designer
- A strong portfolio of illustrations or other graphics
- Good understanding of Color Theory, Contrasts, Typography, and Composition
- Expertise conceptualising ideas into design is crucial
- Keenness to ask questions, do research and understand the Product and target audience
- Excellent attention to detail
- Logical and critical thinker
- Expertise with Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop along with working knowledge of Corel Draw.
- Understanding of Print Media, Image formats and basic understanding of advertising and/or digital marketing
 
Good to have
- Knowledge/experience in visual web design 
- Being a Geek is always a plus
- An eye for photography - Your creative pictures earn you a lot of likes on Instagram
and/or Facebook
 
Annual Salary Range 
- Rs. 4,00,000 - Rs. 6,00,000 

Location 
 - Mumbai

"

Followers: "Poppin Mathias, Nicholas D'Ascensao, David Rouse, Neil Brown"
Description:
"We are looking to hire a Business Development Representative (BDR) to join our growing Inside Sales team as we move deeper into the enterprise market. The Business Development team at Flock is charged with qualifying and producing high quality leads for our sales team. In this role, you will be the first sales contact that a prospect has with Flock. Using outreach emails, phone calls, and social media, you will connect with the right person using the best possible message to set meetings and qualify opportunities for our sales team. Additionally, you will help us farm our installed base of some of the top brands and companies in the world to upsell and cross-sell additional products and services. The BDR program at Flock is a great place to start your career in technology sales and is a great opportunity to learn the fundamentals of sales while working with a product and customer focused team.
"
Additional:
"Benefits

We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth.

And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer relocation benefits. Our work spaces are welcoming and fun. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!

We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration, and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal. If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • As a Business Development Rep, you will execute outreach strategies, research and qualify customers while identifying expansion opportunities within our paying customer base. 
  • Work closely with the Manager of Client Development to pursue deals within our paying customer base.
  • Prepare yourself to close deals so you’re ready to become an Account Executive
  • Conduct a high volume of prospecting hitting daily and monthly activities.
  • Help the customer understand the value of Team Messaging and collaboration (85% of the world does not use a messaging app for work).
  • Setting up meetings with qualified customers through calls, email, and social media
"
ListTitle2: You should apply for this role if
ListContent2:
• You are a sales champion with 1-2 years of experience building pipeline and creating deal preferably from the B2B tech/SAAS space
  • You are curious and eager to learn
  • You have an interest in building a bolstering sales career in the tech space
  • You demonstrate a passion for technology and have the ability to have conversations about the industry with ease
  • You have a deep sense of empathy and high on integrity
  • You have excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • You are a self-starter who is always open to roll up your sleeves for the task at hand.
  • You have demonstrated a track record of successes professionally.
  • You are technologically savvy and familiar working with CRM automation tools.

Followers: "Janushi Saumil Shah, Sandeep Ramchandani, Parag Khushal Barhate, Bhavesh Bhide"
Description:
"We are a data driven organization in which strategic and tactical decisions are driven by metrics like lifetime customer value, ARPU, customer retention rates etc…We are looking for a Machine Learning engineer to be a part of our Business Intelligence Team, help us build machine learning models, utilize the data and build predictive models to generate metrics like future retention rates, profitability and lifetime value of our customers.

As a subscription led business we generate giga-bytes of domain data every day. Our objective is to generate significant Intellectual Property (IP) Assets in the future to not only aid our business but to also be seen as a thought leader in the domain industry. 

We are looking for a data science rockstar who can bring a blend  of:
a. Software engineering skills and know how of various machine learning tools  and applications (eg. Google Cloud Platform, Tensorflow, PyTorch to name a few). 
b. Statistical expertise to evaluate various modelling techniques and suggest usage of the best suited models.

We expect you to be able to scale up the ML team as a part of the BI as the scope and scale of BI activities increase over the next 2-3 years. 
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Collaborate with the business teams to generate statistical models to predict outcomes of the strategies that they plan. 
  • Responsible for the end-to-end deployment of predictive models including scoping, testing, implementation, maintenance, tracking and optimisation of predictive models.
  • Outline resource requirements to fulfil the software development needs.
  • Responsible for complete and accurate documentation of all development around machine learning engineering.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this Role?
ListContent2:
"
  • BSc/BE/BTech in Computer Science, Mathematics or similar field; Master’s degree is a plus.
  • Statistics Background is a plus.
  • Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role.
  • Understanding of data structures, data modeling and software architecture.
  • Deep knowledge of math, probability, statistics and algorithms.
  • Ability to write robust code in Python, Java and R.
  • Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries (like scikit-learn).
  • Excellent communication skills.
  • Ability to work in a team.
  • Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills.
"

Description:
"Role Overview

As an Insights Analyst at Flock, you will be an integral part of GTM Ops, Insights and Analytics team leveraging product data sets for insights’ discovery. To be successful in this role you need to be highly analytical, be comfortable structuring and scoping ambiguous requests, have a passion for querying databases and enjoy presenting your findings in a visually compelling way.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Delivering an exceptionally high level of subject matter expertise advice based on analytics to guide account strategies and tactics for Sales, Marketing, Product, Customer success teams.
  • Writing SQL/Python queries to extract necessary data and presenting information either in AWS Quicksight, Excel or PowerPoint and analyzing the results to generate business insights
  • Creating, automating and managing operational reports and dashboards to monitor the key product and company metrics
  • Collaborating closely with the Marketing, Sales, Product Management and Customer Success teams to provide analysis, reporting and tool-building capabilities
  • Gathering insights around product performance and user engagement/retention from clickstream data.
  • Ensuring data quality and implementing solutions to improve the data quality
  • Identify opportunities to improve and develop analytical solutions to drive revenue, maximise efficiency and deliver excellent customer service within a high quality compliance environment
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Graduate in Computer Science or in “STEM” (Science, Technology, Engineering & Math) majors with min 2-3 years experience 
  • You are proficient in writing complex SQL queries on AWS (Athena)
  • You have experience in data visualization platforms (e.g. Tableau, PowerBI, Quicksight)
  • You have experience with one or more coding and/or scripting languages; Python, R
  • You have experience developing insights across various areas of customer-related data: finance, product, marketing and sales
  • Strong business acumen
  • Meticulous, methodical & extremely well organized in problem solving
  • Experience working with/for a B2B Saas company is a plus
"

Description:
"Directi is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. 
Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Resellerclub, Logicboxes and BigRock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. 

He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.

We are looking for an experienced professional who can join us as Tax Head, work very closely with the CFO and senior management to handle multiple tax practice operations, provide innovative tax planning solutions and review complex international tax transactions.
"
Additional:
"Benefits and Perks

We at Directi love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth.

And Directi goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our workspaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!
If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Manage international tax compliance, design & implement innovative strategies across global group entities.
  • Mergers & Acquisitions and managing cross border structuring.
  • Global Transfer Pricing.
  • Review transactions across all group entities to ensure minimum tax leakages.
  • Review international transactions from the perspective of local laws and double taxation avoidance agreements.
  • Handle wide variety of complex, demanding and high profile transactions related to fundraising, acquisitions, mergers, buy-outs, and joint ventures.
  • Provide innovative tax structures to optimize the desired commercial objectives.
  • Oversee tax returns for the company's international subsidiaries.
  • Handle international litigations and provide reports to the management.
  • Handle GST across all group entities in India.
"

"
  • Functional Competencies:
  • Must be Qualified Chartered Accountant.
  • Post qualification work experience of atleast 10 years with specialization in International taxation.

  • lead and cultivate high performing team
  • design and document policies

  • strong process orientation

ListContent1:

"

ListContent1:
"
  • As an HR Office Assistant, you will be the backbone of the Corporate HR team by managing day to day activities. The core responsibilities include:
  • Managing pre on boarding processes (e.g. creation of records, collecting and maintaining employee documents, providing system access etc) to ensure smooth on boarding

  • Goodies: Ideation with respect to new goodies, procurement of the regular goodies, and inventory management

  • You have good verbal and written communication skills
  • You have good persuasion skills
  • You are meticulous, methodical, & extremely well organized
  • Have basic computer skills, good knowledge of office applications such as Excel and Word

"

  • As an Operations Associate, you will be the backbone of the Talent Acquisition team by managing day to day activities. The core responsibilities include:

  • Meticulous, methodical & extremely well organized.
"

Description:
"About Flock

Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.

Recently, Flock launched Flock Email and Calendar for businesses to support internal conversations with clutter-free app interfaces. Flock Email comes with features like conversation threads, desktop app, integrated video conferencing and anti-virus, Flock Calendar supports meeting reminders, shared calendars, multiple calendars and meeting scheduler.

 Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. Description:
"About the role

CodeChef has the vision to improve the problem-solving ability of programmers and make them better. Given that the vision is large and there is a severe organizational limitation to achieve this, so CodeChef relies on its global network. 

As a Community Coordinator, you will be the face of CodeChef and will be responsible to work closely with the community members. You will act as a bridge between both, and members’ learning experience will be your central metric.

Responsibilities

- Taking initiatives and executing strategies for effective engagement to support the learning of community members
- Recruiting and growing volunteers as required
- Maintaining and forging high-quality relationships with relevant stakeholders
- Providing resources, training support, and coordination that will benefit and grow community relationships and members
- Being available for the community always. That means even on the weekends.

What should you possess

- Passion for working towards CodeChef’s vision
- Has strong leadership abilities
- Has problem-solving, mediation, crisis intervention, and negotiation skills
- Has an understanding of community development principles & practice
- Will flourish and be creative in autonomous work
- Is capable of interacting effectively and building good relationships with relevant stakeholders
- Has experience of working in clubs or social committees and organizing events
- Has the ability to manage numerous priorities
- Will bring strength and innovation to the team

Good to have
- Someone who has been a CodeChef user and understands the community
- Someone who has run coding community groups/clubs
- Someone who is passionate about making programming accessible to all and nurture them

Location
Mumbai

Salary
INR 4,00,000 - 6,00,000
"
