Description:
"Finance Controller will oversee the day to day activities of the Finance function and ensure the company’s finance function is structured to provide efficient support to the organization and all stakeholders wrt the books of accounts, statutory compliance and management reporting and MIS.
"
ListContent1:
"
  • Responsible for statutory financial accounting, including liaison with auditors.
  • Business analysis for local and group management.
  • Management and control of accounts receivable and payable, treasury and payroll.
  • Responsible for all tax returns and tax planning matters.
  • Providing strategic management and support to Continuum India local and international operations, especially international transfer pricing issues.
  • Monitoring the changing regulatory environment.
  • Monitoring and developing internal controls and systems.
  • Identify and support continuous changes and improvements within the business.
  • Oversee the general accounting function, cash management and tax compliance.
  • MIS: Prepare, analyze and present monthly MIS/Management reports to provide actionable inputs to the leadership team.
  • Preparation of Monthly Consolidated P&L and Balance Sheet.
  • Reporting: Prepare standalone financial statements of the Indian entity as per Indian GAAP.
  • Audit: Primary responsibility for interacting with statutory/tax international auditors and ensuring smooth completion of audits.
  • Cash management: Track and report company’s fund position on regular basis,preparing cash flow statements and analyzing actual against budgets.
  • Banking: Manage relationship with banks for various services.
  • Taxes: Ensure compliance with all Indian Indirect tax GST, Shops & Est, Customs) and SEZ regulations.
  • Direct Tax and Labour law regulations.
  • Overseeing the Payroll process & Preparation of GST returns.
"
ListTitle2: Who should apply for this role?
ListContent2:
"
  • Qualified Chartered Accountant with at least 10 years of post-qualification experience.
  • Business and solutions oriented with a proven track record of managing change or establishing financial control systems.
  • Highly IT literate, SAP experience preferred.
  • Past experience as a Financial Controller is a must.
  • Must have the maturity to also discuss and deliberate on issues outside the Finance function, as a member of the India leadership team.
  • Strong skills in stakeholder management and a very strong collaborative style of functioning.
  • Needs to drive a strong ‘customer oriented’ culture and forge excellent partnerships with all stakeholders.
"

Description:
"About Flock

Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration app. At Flock we believe that synchronous messaging tools, supported with internal and external applications, have the power to smash organisational hierarchies, breakdown silos in the workplace, help companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring more personable communication style into the workplace.

Recently, Flock launched Flock Email and Calendar for businesses to support internal conversations with clutter-free app interfaces. Flock Email comes with features like conversation threads, desktop app, integrated video conferencing and anti-virus, Flock Calendar supports meeting reminders, shared calendars, multiple calendars and meeting scheduler.

 Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Resellerclub, Logicboxes and BigRock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions. 
"

Benefits and Perks
We at Flock love our jobs. And it’s no surprise – we get to work on exciting, new projects with some of the best brains in the industry, and that too in a vibrant atmosphere that is designed to be comfortable and conducive for our personal and professional growth. 

And Flock goes the extra mile to make you feel at home. We offer benefits ranging from affordable catered meals and even snacks on the house. Our work-spaces are welcoming and fun, complete with bean bag chairs and ping pong tables. You are free to wear what makes you comfortable and choose the hours you keep, as a team. Oh, and we’ve got your family covered too, with great health insurance plans and other benefits. In short, everything you need to be your best self at work!

We are passionate about helping teams move to the next level of communication and collaboration and believe that happy employees are key to achieving this goal. If you like the idea of working on cutting-edge technologies and solutions that have a truly global impact, get in touch!
"

Description:
"Flock’s Marketing Management Program prepares highly talented early-career professionals to assume roles in fast-paced, results-driven disciplines at Flock. The program places new managers in an incredibly dynamic role owning initiatives which will grow Flock’s brand, userbase and customer base in multiple global markets.
The program includes a rotation period across teams within the marketing function. The assignments will increase in their level of responsibility and complexity and involve working closely with all levels of leadership within the company. 

What is the job like?

This role is designed to help you build expertise and contribute to different teams within the Marketing function. You will play a vital role in the day to day activities across our performance, organic, lifecycle, operations, and content marketing teams to support Flock’s products. This program is specifically designed to give new managers the experience needed to work with teams and collaborate cross-functionally with key leaders within Marketing to solve our toughest challenges, advocate high priority projects, and drive greater operational rigour.  
Upon completion of the rotational program, employees will have the knowledge and experience needed to make informed decisions about their permanent role at Flock. Each individual will have a unique path for each individual based off of her or his interests as well as the needs of the business.

The Marketing org at Flock consists of the following teams:

Performance Marketing: This team manages all paid marketing and demand generation efforts
Organic Acquisition: This team undertakes a number of initiatives to improve Flock’s brand visibility and user acquisition across the internet through organic search, referrals and other non-paid marketing experiments
Lifecycle Marketing: This team leads user communications - from external (email and push notifications) to internal, in-app communications. The team’s primary objective is to drive product adoption and ultimately drive higher user-to-customer conversion
Content Strategy: This team is responsible for Flock’s overall content messaging strategy, which includes our blog, thought leadership content, web copy, co-marketing, social, and content distribution.
Analytics & Ops: This team serves as the knowledge centre within the marketing organization, leveraging data, systems, and processes to ensure optimal program execution and measurement

Who should apply to this role?
The ideal candidate has
Marketing related experience
Work experience between 2-5 years
Strong quantitative skills
Strong written and verbal communication skills
A hypothesis-driven approach to problem-solving and is comfortable tackling broad-reaching and ambiguous questions
The ability to establish and manage multiple priorities in a dynamic environment
Interest in a high volume/transactional business model
A disdain for the status quo; is able to think and act outside the confines of the job description and desire to contribute value in other areas of growth 
A passion for narrating a compelling story and building an international brand

Why you should apply to Flock
Flock is an enterprise messaging and collaboration company. At Flock, we believe that messaging tools, combined with a cultural will, have the power to smash organizational hierarchies and break down silos in the workplace. Flock helps companies better capture innovative ideas, support individuals in making faster decisions, and also bring a more personable communication style into the workplace. With 30,000 businesses already using our messaging platform, we know that we are onto something big, and are gearing up for a period of rapid growth.

Flock operates out of multiple offices across the globe, with our Marketing org based out of Mumbai in India and Boston, MA in the United States. We’re an international company built for a global audience. We’ve grown in leaps and bounds, and have grown the team 2x in the last two quarters alone.

Flock is founded by Bhavin Turakhia. Serial entrepreneur and billionaire, Bhavin Turakhia is driven by a passion for problem-solving and maximizing efficiency through technology-driven innovations. In the last 22 years, he has built 5 successful businesses, all driven by his belief that “it is our moral obligation to make an impact that is proportionate to our potential”. At 17, he co-founded Reseller club, Logic boxes and Big Rock, which he exited in a $160mn transaction in 2014. He is presently heading Flock - a suite of productivity apps, Zeta - a digital payments platform, and Radix - a leading registry for top-level extensions.

"

Description: Directi is looking for a resourceful and knowledgeable Global Secretarial Compliance Associate who will ensure that global subsidiaries of our organization remain compliant with local requirements.
ListContent1:

  • Track any update or change in the Companies Act and proactively bring it to the attention of the organization and initiate the process of implementation
  • Ensure that Board meetings/ shareholders meeting  are conducted in every overseas location on a regular and timely basis
  • Drafting of the Agenda papers, Notices, resolutions , minutes or any other documents required
  • Coordinate with foreign agencies and directors/shareholders to ensure availability and conduct board meetings/shareholders meetings
  • Ensure that Board minutes/resolutions capture all important aspects of the business conducted in the quarter
  • Ensuring compliance with relevant provisions of the Companies Act, or any other applicable Statute
  • Liaison with agencies/consultants/ registrars  / Auditors, Bankers or any other External/ Statutory Authorities, Business Teams etc.
  • Proactive in bringing to light any changes in regulations, and also understand the importance of such changes in the group and devise means for the effective implementation of the relevant changes
  • Maintain and update records of resolutions, minutes, statutory documents, etc
"

Description:
"Responsibilities

Participate in all the phases of the product, from discovery to delivery to iteration. You’ll work closely with Product Managers, Interaction Designers, Visual Designers and Front-end Engineers to build a robust design system and a world-class product.

You will be responsible for designing a holistic experience taking into consideration various user touchpoints, and understanding the user’s journey over time as they interact with the product.

Rapidly iterate and prototype new features. You should know how to use prototypes as a primary canvas for communicating ideas both internally and externally.

You will be involved in user testing to be able to constantly validate and refine ideas as well as collect new insights. You should be able to discard ideas, no matter how good they are, if they fail to drive value to our end users.

You should exhibit fluency in both Interaction and Visual Design, knowing when to dive into wireframes and when to plunge into pixel-perfection. 

What we’re looking for

A very strong understanding of interaction and visual design concepts.

Ability to conduct research and usability testing.

The ability to clearly communicate and document your design decisions.

Excellent communication skills.

Understanding of the nuances of each platform, be it Desktop, Android or iOS.

Mastery of design tools including Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, Principle etc.

"
